Carlos lives in Jiquilisco, in the department of Usulutn. He makes a living selling new clothing and is also employed at the same time. He lives with his family, his mother and his daughter. The clothing business, which he has had for a year, is administrated by his mother.
He wishes to invest in the business, buying more clothing to vary the styles and colors. This purchase will help him to better his business and to be able to offer clients different clothing garment options.
Carlos plans on increasing the volume of merchandise to offer a wide range of clothing for children and adults, while increasing the quality of life for his family and also growing as a shopkeeper.

loan.use: To buy clothing of various fashionable styles and colors.

loan.name: Yolanda

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal VIRGEN NATIVIDAD; Este banco est ubicado en la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Yolanda: es casada y tiene 40 aos la socia tiene 3 hijos de 13, 9, 8 aos de edad, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el comercio minorista, la socia tiene terrenos de cultivo en los cuales produce maz, la socia luego de recoger el choclo y venderlo, toma el restante del maz y lo seca, para venderlo en dos meses ms cuando este producto eleve su precio, la socia es una mujer muy trabajadora y trabaja junto a su esposo y a su parientes, ellos tambin venden al por mayor a los comerciantes mayoristas y es bien conocida el producto del valle sagrado de los inkas por lo que tiene mayor acogida y sus productos son comprados por extranjeros y llevados fuera del pas. La socia solicita el prestamo para invertir en la compra de semillas, abono y remover la tierra para una nueva epoca de cultivo.
La socia est muy agradecida por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de dicho prstamo de forma disciplinada.
texts.en:
Sra. Yolanda is a member of the Communal Bank Virgen Natividad which is located in Urubamba Province in the Department of Cusco.

She is 40 years old, married, and has three children (ages 13, 9, and 8). Yolanda divides her time between her daily activities and her small business. She has land on which she grows corn. After most of her harvest is collected and sold, Yolanda takes any remaining corn and dries it. She sells the corn two months later once the price has increased.

Yolanda is a hardworking woman who partners with her husband and his relatives. She also sells in bulk to the wholesale merchants and her products have been recognized within the Sacred Valley of the Incas. Her products are even purchased by foreigners and carried outside of the country. She is requesting a loan to invest in the purchase of seeds and fertilizers, as well as pay to have her land plowed for the new crop season.

Yolanda is very grateful for the loan and promises to complete her payments in a disciplined manner.

loan.use: to purchase seeds and fertilizers, as well as pay to have her land plowed for the new crop season.

loan.name: Marcelino

texts.es: Marcelino tiene 45 aos, su actividad econmica es ofrecer el servicio de taxi. Este hombre recorre muchos lugares todos los das, a pesar de ser un trabajo ya que solamente descansa para tomar agua. El es un hombre trabajador y futuro empresario pues siempre est pensando en un sin nmero de medios para mejorar sus ingresos por lo que es una persona muy ejemplar. El financiamiento que solicita es para la compra de de repuesto de su vehculo, focos, caja de cambios y realizarle un chequeo a su taxi y as ofrecer un buen servicio.
texts.en:
Marcelino is 45 years old. His business is offering a taxi service. He drives many places every day. He only rests to drink water.
Marcelino is a hard-working man and future entrepreneur as he is always thinking of lots of ways to improve his income. He is an exemplary person.
Marcelino is requesting this loan to buy spare parts for his vehicle (headlamps and a gear box), and to have his taxi serviced so that he can offer a good service to his customers.

loan.use: to buy spare parts (headlamps and gear box), and to have his taxi serviced

loan.name: Akou

texts.fr: Marie un footballeur / revendeur, Akou est une jeune dame de 38ans dynamique qui revend des pagnes. Elle revend au march dAkodesswa aprs avoir acheter au grand march de Lom. Elle est dans cette activit depuis 1990 et elle sy plait. Elle veut cet argent pour acheter des pagnes pour vendre toutes personnes pour avoir de bnfices afin de mieux soccuper de sa famille, avoir sa propre boutique et aprs sa propre maison.
texts.en:
Akou is a young, 38-year-old, dynamic woman who sells pagnes (colorful print cloth). She is married to a footballer and reseller. She buys her merchandise at the grand market of Lom, and conducts her sales at the Akodesswa market.
She started this business in 1990 and really enjoys it. She is seeking a loan to buy pagnes, which she will sell to anyone. She hopes to make profits that will help her to better care for her family, have her own shop, and then her own house.

loan.use: to buy pagnes

loan.name: Maria

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal VIRGEN NATIVIDAD; Este banco est ubicado en la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Maria: es casada y tiene 54 aos la socia tiene 6 hijos de los cuales 5 de ellos son independientes y uno tiene 18 aos es el menor de la familia y la socia an le sigue apoyando en los estudios y en todo lo referente a la economa y lo moral, la socia tiene su negocio de verduras ella cultiva tambin en su terrenos verduras, la socia tambin a su vez tiene animales menores, tiene gallinas, cuyes, y estos los vende en la feria, la socia desea invertir el prstamo en la compra de cuyes para la venta. La socia compra animales menores, los cra, engorda y reproducen, la socia cuando alcanzan los animales la madures los vende. La socia solicita el prstamo para comprar animales menores.
La socia est muy agradecida por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de dicho prstamo de forma disciplinada.
texts.en:
Maria is a member of the VIRGEN NATIVIDAD community bank which is located in Urubamba province, in Cusco department.
Maria is 54 years old, married, and has six children. Five of her children live independently but she still supports her youngest, who is 18, with his studies, and also financially and morally. Maria has a vegetable business. She grows vegetables on her own land. She also raises young animals. She keeps hens and guinea pigs which she sells at market. Maria would like to invest her loan in buying guinea pigs to sell. She buys young animals, raises them, fattens them and breeds them. When they are grown, she sells them. She is requesting her loan to buy young animals.
Maria is very grateful for her loan and pledges to make her repayments in a disciplined manner.

loan.use: to buy young animals

loan.name: Magdai

texts.es:
La seora Magdai Snchez M., es madre soltera quien afortunadamente ya todos sus hijos estn casados, tiene a su responsabilidad a dos nietos y son: Axel de siete aos de edad y Roxana de nueve aos quienes son su razn de seguir adelante.
Ella tiene una tienda de abarrotes que lleva por nombre abarrotes kendra y solcito el prstamo el crdito para invertirlo comprando mercanca de mejor precio y la que sus clientes desean comprar, en su negocio lleva seis aos lo que nos comenta que le va bien.
Se inspiro en ello para tener de donde pagar los gastos generados en su familia ya que su esposo el abandono con sus hijos pequeo y tena que buscar la manera de trabajar, comenz vendiendo frutas hasta que sus hijos crecieron la apoyaron aponer su negocio de abarrotes que es con lo que est trabajando hasta ahora.
Su sueo es seguir trabajando para apoyar a sus nietos a seguir adelante con sus estudios y lograr termine una carrera de la que les pueda ser til ms adelante.
texts.en:
Magdai Snchez M. is a single mother. Fortunately, all her children are now married. She has two grandchildren in her care: 7 year-old Axel and 9 year-old Roxana. They are her reason for carrying on.
Magdai has a grocery store called 'Abarrotes Kendra' (Kendra Groceries). She requested this loan to invest in buying merchandise that her customers would like to buy for a better price. She has been running her store for six years and she tells us that it is doing well.
Magdai set up her business so that she would have enough money to cover her family's expenses since her husband left her alone with her young children and she had to find a way to work. She started out selling fruit and then when her children grew up they supported her in setting up her grocery store which is where she now works.
Magdai's dream is to continue working so that she can support her grandchildren in getting ahead in their studies, so that they can go on to complete a university degree which will be useful to them in the future.

loan.use: to invest in buying merchandise to stock her grocery store

loan.name: Akoko Abla

texts.fr: Rsidant B-Kpota (un quartier pas trs loin de la ville), Abla est mre dun(01) enfant. Elle vend des pagnes depuis 1987 en achetant au Grand March de Lom et en revendant au march dAkodesswa. Elle est une femme active qui sait se battre pour assurer un avenir meilleur son enfant, avoir son propre terrain pour construire sa maison et voir son activit prosprer cest dans ce sens quelle dsire ce premier prt pour acheter des pagnes afin de revendre pour avoir de bnfices.
texts.en: A resident of B-Kpota (a district not far from the city), Abla is a mother of one child. She has been selling pagnes (colorful West African cloth) since 1987 by buying at the Grand Market of Lom and selling at the market of Akodesswa. Abla is a very active woman who knows how to struggle to ensure her child will have a better future, to have her own plot of land for building a house, and to see her business prosper. For these aims, she would like to obtain this initial loan in order to buy pagne cloth for resale, so as to make a profit.

loan.use: to buy traditional cloth

loan.name: Rosa Lidia

texts.es:
La seora Rosa Lidia Hernndez Snchez, vive en la localidad de ngel albino corzo, es madre soltera con una hija de nombre Kendra Yojari de diez aos que cursa el cuarto de primaria.
El prstamo solicitado lo invirti en la compra de mercanca como son: azcar, galletas, aceite, frijol, entre otros, en esta actividad lleva tres aos y ocho meses lo que nos comenta que le va bien a pesar de las temporadas.
Se inspiro por su hija ya que fue madre soltera y para sacarla adelante tena que tener algo de lo que pudiera trabajar y lograr solventar sus gastos generados en su hogar.
Su deseo es que con el tiempo logre ahorrar para trabajar y as tener como comprar su material de lo que utilizara para comenzar a construir su esttica, para seguir trabajando y ganar su propio dinero para salir adelante.
texts.en:
Rosa lives in the locality of Angel Albino Corzo, and is a single mother with a daughter named Kendra Yojari, 10 years old, who is in her 4th year of primary school.
The loan Rosa requests will be used to purchase merchandise such as sugar, cookies, cooking oil, and beans, among other things. She has been engaged in this activity for 3 years and 8 months, and she says it's going well, though a bit on and off.
Rosa, as a single mother, is motivated by her daughter. To advance Kindra, Rosa had to have something she could work at to cover the costs generated by the household.
Rosa's desire is that over time, she will be able to save from her earnings and thereby, be able to buy the material she would need to begin to build a beauty salon, so that she can work there and earn her own money to get ahead.

loan.use: to buy merchandise to restock her grocery store.

loan.name: Fuerza Divina 4 Group

texts.en:
Antonia lives in Hato Mayor, one of the countrys more rural cities whose economy depends on agriculture. Antonia and her group of five members are taking loans for their businesses. Most of them sell clothes and miscellaneous products. This group is named Fuerza Divina 4 (Divine strength).
This is Antonias 11th loan with Esperanza International after she successfully repaid her previous loans, each of which gave her one more step toward improving her business and her life. She said that she has been able to start building her house, which was one of her most difficult challenges. Now her home is in the building process, thanks to these loans, her savings and profits from her business.
Antonia runs a miscellaneous products sales business. She will invest this loan to buy accessories and underwear to sell. She has had her business for over five years, starting when she received her first Esperanza loan.
She says that her favorite thing is to work on her business and she wants to see her children become professionals. Antonia and her group are thankful for your support!

loan.use: to buy underwear and accessories to sell.

loan.name: Yareni

texts.es:
La seora Yareny T. S., vive en la localidad de ngel Alvino Corzo, Municipio de Copainala Estado de Chiapas, Mxico.
El prstamo solicitado lo invirti en la compra de cosmticos de la marca jafra, como son: labiales, perfumes, maquillajes, entre otros, y comenta que le va bien a pesar de qu tiene que trabajar fuera de su hogar.
Ella inicio esta actividad para tener de donde solventar sus gastos que se generan en su hogar, aun que es una mujer sola desea lo mejor para su bien estar. Su deseo ms grande es lograr crecer con su negocio que es con lo que depende para salir adelante.
texts.en:
Yareny T. S. lives in the town of ngel Alvino Corzo, in the Copainala Municipality in the State of Chiapas, Mexico.
The loan she is seeking is to buy Jafra-brand cosmetics, including lipsticks, perfumes, foundation, etc. She says things are going well, even though she has to work outside her home.
Yareny started her business so she could pay off her household expenses, and, though she is a single woman, she wants to be as comfortable as possible.
Her greatest wish is to succeed in growing her business, which is what she depends on to get ahead.

loan.use: to catalog-purchase Jafra-brand cosmetics.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to purchase additional hardware inventory.

loan.name: Aminata

texts.en:
This is 50-year-old Aminata. She is married, and has two school-going children. She has one additional dependent, whom she adopted. In the year 1992, she started her Africana dress and sandals business. She has been able to manage the business and has a very good loan repayment history. She opens her business 6 days a week and 9 hours a day.
Aminata has received and successfully repaid one loan and now needs a loan of 3,000,000 SLL. She needs a loan in order to buy African dresses, sandals and accessories for her business. In the future Aminata hopes to educate her children to the university level. She thanks you for your support.

loan.use: to buy sandals, necklaces, bracelets and Bamako clothing to sell.

loan.name: Las 5 Rosas Group

texts.es: La seora Angelina Garca Gutirrez, vive en la localidad de Emiliano Zapata, Municipio de Tecpatan Estado de Chiapas Mxico. Ella es casada con el seor Elas Snchez Chavarra y con quien procreo siete hijos quienes ya estn casados. El prstamo que solicito en fundacin realidad es para invertirlo en la compra de trastes de peltre como son: ollas, sartenes, visones, entre otros, nos comenta que con esta actividad lleva ocho aos y cinco lo que formalizo apenas solicito un prstamo en compartamos y le fue muy, es as como ha estado trabajando todo este tiempo. Para iniciar esta actividad lo animo una compra ya que ella le entregaba la mercanca para que la vendiera en su localidad le grado la idea y es como lo sigue practicando pero ahora ya es de ella, de lo que se siente contenta porque con ello se apoya para sus ingresos de su hogar. Lo que Ms desea es que Dios le siga prestando vida para seguir trabajando y as progresar con su pequea actividad. Las personas que integran en el grupo son cuatro seoras ms y cada una se dedica a diferente actividad: Silveria C. Guzmn: ella se dedica a la panadera Blanca Leticia Espinosa H.: se dedica a criar pollos de rancho para posteriormente venderlo. Manuela Gmez Hernndez: engorda pollo con alimento para despus venderlo. Sofa Garca Snchez: ella se dedica a la venta de tamales, de bola y hoja de guineo.
texts.en: Angelina Garca Gutirrez lives in the town of Emiliano Zapata, in the municipality of Tecpatan, in the state of Chiapas, Mexico. She is married to Elas Snchez Chavarra. Together they have seven children who are already married. The loan that the reality foundation is asking for will be used to purchase pewter dishes such as: pots, pans, and other things. She tells us that she has eight years of experience with this activity. For five years she has been asking for shared loans. It has taken her far, and in this way she has been working all this time. To start this activity, she made a purchase. Since she had been turning in the goods to be sold in her community, the idea was supported. It is in this way that she continues practicing. But now it is hers. She feels happy because with it she is supported with the income for her home. What she wants the most is that God will continue to give her life to continue working and therefore progress with her small activity. The people that make up the rest of the group are four women. Each one does a different activity: Silveria C. Guzmn: She works in a bakery. Blanca Leticia Espinosa H.: She raises ranch chickens to sell later on. Manuela Gmez Hernndez: She fattens chickens with food to sell later. Sofa Garca Snchez: She sells tamales, in a ball and banana leaves.

loan.use: To buy pewter dishes to later sell in the same area.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to invest immediately in a lbigger quantity of footwear, including sandals and slipper, in both women's and men's styles

loan.name: Brahunda Group

texts.es: A 40 minutos de veraC. se encuentra una comunidad llamada barahunda esta cominudad se caracteriza porque cerca de ahi se encuentran varios posos petroleros de PEMEX. En esta comunidad existe un grupo llamado Barahunda al cual llamaron asi porque es el nombre de su comunidad y por el significado de la palabra que es: fiesta, bullicio o ruido ya que este grupo se caracteriza por ser muy alegre y unido. Doa Elia Moran es uno de los integrantes de este grupo, ella tiene la edad de 60 aos y tuvo 6 hijos los cuales ya estan casados actualmente vive con dos de sus nietos. Ella nos platica que hace mas de 7 aos tuvo la inquietud de trabajar y con el apoyo de sus hijos abrio una muebleria en su comunidad a la cual llamo "Muebleria Diana" en honor a la mas pequea de sus nietas, ella tambien se dedica a la cria de puercos tiene un pequeo corral en la parte de atras de su casa en el cual tiene a sus puercos. Doa Elia necesita este credito para invertirlo en la compra de alimento para sus cerdos y algunos muebles(cajoneras, licuadoras, batidoras y planchas) para resurtir su negocio. Ella espera que con este credito o su negocio progrese y las vantas aumenten ya que desea obtener buenas ganancias para poder pintar su negocio y seguir invirtiendo en el. Doa Elia nos dijo: "voy a provechar para agradecer a la fundacion por el prestamo y la confianza que me ha otorgado". Los otros integrantes del grupo son: Maria de Lourdes G. C.- venta de catlogo cosmeticos Josefa C.- venta de pollos y dulces Alicia Snchez C.-venta de productos naturistas Rosa Ramrez R.-venta por cata lago de cosmticos Maricela T.- venta de ropa y visuteria Iras E. Hernndez-venta de zapatos para dama Mayra M. - Venta de carne de cerdo Elizabeth M.-comercio de ganado
texts.en:
Forty minutes from VeraC. is a community called Barahunda. This community is noted for the fact that there are several PEMEX oil wells located there. In this community there is a group called 'Barahunda'. The group chose this name because it is the name of their community and also because the word means 'fiesta', 'bustle' or 'noise" which describes this very cheerful and united group.
Elia Moran is one of the group's members. She is 60 years old and has six children who are all married. She currently lives with two of her grandchildren. She tells us that more than 7 years ago she wanted to work and, with the support of her children, she opened a furniture store in her community called "Muebleria Diana" (Diana's Furniture Store) in honor of her youngest granddaughter. Elia also raises pigs. She has a small farmyard behind her home where she keeps her pigs. Elia needs this loan to invest in buying feed for her pigs and some household products (chests of drawers, blenders, mixers and irons) to re-stock her business.
Elia hopes that this loan will help her to make progress in her business and that her sales will increase since she would like to make good profits so that she can paint her business and continue investing in it. Elia tells us "I am going to take this opportunity to thank Fundacin Realidad for the loan and the trust that they have placed in me".
The other members of this group are: Maria de Lourdes G.-C., who sells cosmetics through a catalog Josefa C., who sells chickens and sweet treats Alicia Snchez C., who sells natural products Rosa Ramrez R., who sells cosmetics through a catalog Maricela T., who sells clothes and costume jewelry Iras E. Hernndez, who sells ladies' shoes Mayra M., who sells pork Elizabeth M., who sells livestock

loan.use: to buy furniture, blenders, irons, beds, pig feed, catalogs, men's and women's clothes, and supplies for making Mexican snacks

loan.name: Memuna

texts.en:
Memuna is 35 years old. She is married to a school teacher and has a 10-year-old child. In 1996, she established her imported food stuff business. She began her business when she realized that she needed to contribute financially to provide livelihood for their family. She opens her business 6 days a week and 10 hours a day.
Memuna has a good loan repayment history. She would like a loan in the amount of 3,000,000 SLL in order to buy more imported stuff to sell. She thanks you for your support.

loan.use: to buy different types of imported stuff for her business.

loan.name: Jose Eliseo

texts.es: Jos, administra un Car Wash, reside en Jiquilisco departamento de Usulutn, vive con su esposa y su familia, aun no tienen hijos, l inicio el car Wash hace un ao, dedicndose a tiempo completo, con este trabajo logra mantener los gastos de la familia. l solicita un prstamo para la compra de una mquina para lavar vehculos, su objetivo es tener en mejores condiciones el negocio y espera que con la compra logre parte de su objetivo. Jos cuenta con un sueo y es administrar dos negocios en diferentes puntos de Jiquilisco, que le permita mejorar las condiciones actuales de su familia.
texts.en:
Jos lives in the town of Jiquilisco of the department of Usulutn with his wife and his family; they do not have children yet. A year ago, he started a car wash business -- a job that he does full-time and that allows him to cover his family's expenses.
Jos is looking for a loan in order to purchase machinery for his car wash business. His goal is to improve the level of his service, and he hopes that this purchase would allow him to do that. Jos's dream is to administer two car wash locations in Jiquilisco -- something that would allow him to improve the living conditions for his family.

loan.use: to purchase machinery for a car wash business

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: To buy thermoses for coffee and supplies

loan.name: Wulamatu

texts.en: This is 31-year-old Wulamatu S., a single woman with one dependent, her elder sisters son. Wulamatu, who is very determined to conscientiously improve her business, has been selling bags for the past two years, working seven days a week for ten hours each day. She is now requesting a loan of Le 3,000,000 to buy a large quantity of various bags for her business. She thanks you for your support.

loan.use: to buy a variety of bags for her business

loan.name: Veronica Cecilia

texts.es: Vernica Cecilia P. es una mujer muy conocida en el barrio san Jos de la ciudad de Barranquilla, pues all tiene un gimnasio donde ofrece para la venta productos energticos que regulan el organismo despus de las actividades ldico-deportivas, que all se practican y que sirven para para rehidratar y recuperar carbohidratos y electrolitos. Vernica comenz haciendo ejercicios en la sala de su casa con familiares, a los que se fueron agregando vecinos y gradualmente amigos de los asistentes y referidos, los que hoy conforman su ms consentida clientela, por eso Vernica en trminos de que sus clientes estuvieran mejor atendidos, ha ido gradualmente agregando productos a una pequea vitrina que compr y que debe permanecer surtida, pues sus clientes consumen estos productos en grandes cantidades y como la clientela ha aumentado terminan rpidamente con la oferta que ella hace de agua, gatorade, caf, jugos naturales de naranja etc. Este es su primer financiamiento al que est aplicando con la Fundacin Mario Santo Domingo, con el comprar Agua, gatorade, naranjas y productos energticos en general, de contado y en mayor volumen.
texts.en:
Vernica Cecilia P. is a very well-known woman in the San Jos neighborhood in Barranquilla. That is where she has a gymnasium where she sells energy products. These products regulate the body after recreational sporting activities at the gym. These products rehydrate and replenish carbohydrates and electrolytes.
Vernica started doing exercises with family members in the living room of her house. Neighbors started joining them, and gradually friends of the assistants and people who were referred did as well. Now they are her most favorite customers. That is why Vernica has gradually been adding products in a small display case that she purchased so that her customers can be better served.
She needs to always be well-stocked because her customers consume these products in great quantities. As her number of customers has increased, she quickly runs out of water, Gatorade, coffee, and orange juice, etc.
This is the first loan that she has applied for with the Fundacin Mario Santo Domingo. She will use it to buy water, Gatorade, oranges, and energizing products on installments and in greater volume.

loan.use: to buy energizing products and soft drinks

loan.name: Octavio De Jess

texts.es:
Octavio M. trabaja como vendedor ambulante hace 18 aos. Comenz con este oficio en las calles de la ciudad de Medelln y hace 10 aos aproximadamente decidi especializarse en la venta y reparacin de sombrillas. Usualmente trabaja de lunes a sbado de 6:30a.m. a 7:00p.m, pero como es independiente tiene la posibilidad de escoger sus horarios segn sus facilidades. Octavio es padre de 5 hijos por lo tanto su mayor sueo es generar ms ingresos que le permitan darle a su familia comodidad econmica y mejorar su calidad de vida.
Octavio debe surtir su negocio cada determinado tiempo pero a veces sus ingresos no le alcanzan para comprar la mercanca necesaria y as obtener mejores ganancias. Es por esto que solicita el crdito porque es conciente que comprando los insumos al por mayor podr tener mayores beneficios y un incremento en las ventas.
texts.en:
Octavio M. has worked as an itinerant salesman for 18 years. He started in this line of work on the streets of the city of Medelln. Approximately ten years ago he decided to specialize in selling and repairing umbrellas.
He usually works Mondays through Saturdays from 6:30 a.m. until 7:00 p.m. Because he works independently he can choose his schedule according to what works best for him.
Octavio has five children, and his greatest dream is to generate more income. This would allow him to make his family financially comfortable and improve their quality of live.
Octavio needs to stock his business every so often. Sometimes his income is not enough to buy the needed merchandise to get improved income. That is why he is requesting the loan. He knows that by purchasing the supplies wholesales he will be able to have greater benefits and increase his sales.

loan.use: to buy merchandise to stock his business

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: for the purchase of fertilizers.

loan.name: Antoliano

texts.es: El sr Antoliano, tiene 72 aos, est casado con la sra. Waldina Iriarte, con quien tiene 4 hijos todos mayores de edad, de los cuales 2 viven con ellos, una de 30 aos que es profesora y otra de 22 aos que es licenciada. El titular es taxista desde que tenia 23 aos, o sea en el ao 1962 ya obtuvo para su Parada de taxi en el mismo lugar que actualmente utiliza. Naci en la ciudad de Yaguarn, pero est radicado desde chico en la ciudad de Asuncin, manifiesta que haciendo un resumen de los aos de trabajo que lleva recorriendo todas las calles del Gran Asuncin, dice que es un trabajo que tiene su riesgo, muchas veces se trabaja en turnos de la noche, o se lleva pasajeros que muchas veces no conocemos y tienen apariencia peligrosa, pero tambin esta profesin genera buenos ingresos como hay otras veces en que no pasa nada, apunt. Su seora es de profesin modista, posee su propia clientela y con los aportes de sus hijos el sr. P. tiene una vida digna que es lo que le da satisfaccin. El solicita el crdito para poder arreglar su vehculo, realizarle un mantenimiento y seguir generando ganancias a la canasta familiar.
texts.en:
Antoliano is 72 years old and married to Waldina Iriarte. They have four grown-up children, two of whom still live with them. One is 30 years old and a teacher, the other is 22 years old and a college graduate.
Antoliano has been working as a taxi driver for 23 years. He obtained his place on a taxi stand in 1962 and he still works from the same spot. He was born in the city of Yaguarn but has lived in the city of Asuncin since he was a young boy. He gives us a summary of the years he has worked the streets of Gran Asuncin. He says "It is a job that has its risks. Often you work night shifts or carry passengers who you do not know, who might look dangerous. However, the job also makes good money as there are other times when nothing bad happens".
Antoliano's wife is a dressmaker. She has her own customer base and, together with the money his children make, Mr P. has a decent life which makes him pleased. He is requesting this loan so that he can repair his vehicle, have some maintenance work done on it, and continue making profits for his family.

loan.use: to repair his vehicle

loan.name: Kadiatu

texts.en:
Kadiatu M. is a 29-year-old business woman. She is married and has one girl child aged 9. She has three additional dependents who live with her because they are her relatives and she opted to assist with their schooling.
In 2004, Kadiatu established a local food business. She began her business because she wants to be self-reliant and empowered to assist her husband in providing livelihood for their family.
She opens her business six days a week and eight hours a day.
She would like a loan in the amount of SLL 3,000,000. Kadiatu requires this loan in order to purchase local food for her business. "This loan will help boost my savings for my children's education," said Kadiatu. She thanks you for your support.

loan.use: To buy local food for her business

loan.name: Susana Del Carmen

texts.es: Susana, reside en San Carlos, departamento de Morazn, se dedica a la venta de productos de primera necesidad, vive con su esposo y su hija de 6 meses de nacida, ella tiene el negocio desde hace 10 aos, ofrece a los clientes arroz, frijoles, azcar, boquitas, aceite y detergentes. Actualmente necesita un prstamo para la compra de ms mercadera como arroz, aceite, pastas, condimentos y detergentes, esta compra le ayudara a tener ms productos a disponibilidad de los clientes. Su objetivo es mejorar el negocio y as mismo la vivienda para tener una casa digna junto a su familia.
texts.en:
Susana lives with her husband and her six-month-old daughter in the town of San Carlos of the Morazn department. She makes her living selling basic necessity products -- a business that she has been running for ten years, offering her clients items such as rice, beans, sugar, snacks, cooking oil, and detergent.
Susana is currently seeking a loan to purchase additional inventory of rice, cooking oil, pasta, seasonings, and detergent. This purchase will allow her to ensure product availability for her clients. Susana's objective is to improve her business which in turn would allow her to improve her living conditions and have a decent home for herself and her family.

loan.use: to purchase inventory: rice, cooking oil, seasonings, detergent, etc

loan.name: Maria Basilia

texts.es: Mara, reside en San Carlos departamento de Morazn, se dedica a la venta de tortillas y tamales, vive con su esposo y sus cuatro hijos, Mara vende tortillas de lunes a domingo, en su casa y prepara la venta de tamales una vez por semana. Ella est solicitando un prstamo para la compra maz y lea, estos materiales son muy necesarios para mejorar su produccin y tener disponibilidad de materiales. Su aspiracin es ayudar a sus hijos ya que estudian y que estos puedan superarse y tener mejores oportunidades de crecimiento.
texts.en:
Mara lives in San Carlos in Morazn department with her husband and their four children. She sells tortillas and tamales (cornmeal and meat or beans wrapped in corn husks or banana leaves) daily in her house. She makes the tamales once a week for sale.
She is requesting a loan to buy corn and firewood which she needs to increase her production with the materials on hand. Her wish is to help her children now that they are in school so that they can do well and have better opportunities to develop.

loan.use: buy corn and firewood

loan.name: Jose Irrael

texts.es: Jos reside en San Carlos departamento de Morazn, se dedica a la crianza de cerdos y al cultivo de maz y frijol, vive con su esposa y una hija en casa de sus suegros, su trabajo es engordar a los cerdos para comercializarlos, tambin en temporada cultiva maz y frijol. El solicita un prstamo que necesita para comprar productos agrcolas como abono y fertilizantes, tambin comprar cerdos, esto le ayudara para mejorar su negocio y contar con esta fuente de ingreso por un largo tiempo. Su sueo es comprar un lote donde pueda construir su propia casa y vivir con sus hijos y esposa.
texts.en:
Jose lives in San Carlos in the department of Morazn. He raises pigs and cultivates corn and beans. He lives with his wife and daughter in his in-law's house. He works to fatten the pigs so that he can sell them, and at the same time he cultivates corn and beans according to the season.
He is requesting a loan because he needs to buy farming supplies such as organic and chemical fertilizers. He also wants to buy pigs, because that would help him to improve his business and have a source of income for a longer time.
His dream is to buy a plot of land where he could build his own home and live with his children and his wife.

loan.use: to buy organic and chemical fertilizers

loan.name: Abdulai

texts.en:
This is 25-year-old Abdulai C.. He is married and has one child, aged 1 year.
Abdulai has been selling motor spare parts and lubricants. Working seven days a week and 11 hours a day, he earns about SLL 400,000 every month.
He would like a loan in the amount of SLL 3,000,000. Abdulai requires this loan in order to buy engine oil for resale. He hopes that this loan will enable him to increase his monthly profits by approximately SLL 150,000. He thanks you for your support.

loan.use: To buy drums of engine oil for resale.

loan.name: Ricardo

texts.es: Ricardo, reside en Quelepa, departamento de San Miguel, trabaja en Fibras de El Salvador (elaboracin de muebles), vive solo, es viudo y sus hijos tienen sus propios hogares, desde joven inicio como ayudante de un taller y hace 10 aos instalo su propio taller donde perfecciona el oficio de trabajar con fibra de vidrio. El necesita un prstamo para la compra de resina (barril), hierro, tubos cilndricos, cuadrados, tornillos y otros materiales; Este prstamo le ayudara a realizar una buena compra y a un precio ms bajo de lo normal. Sus aspiraciones es crecer como microempresario, tener una buena solvencia econmica para el pago de las cuotas de este prstamo y para cubrir sus gastos personales.
texts.en:
Ricardo lives in Quelepa in the department of San Miguel. He has a workshop called "Fibras de El Salvador" where he makes furniture made of fiberglass. He is a widower who lives alone; his children have their own homes. From the time that he was very young he worked as an assistant in a workshop. Ten years ago he set up his own workshop where he perfects the craft of working with fiberglass.
He needs a loan to buy resin (a barrel), iron, cylindrical tubes, drafting squares, screws and other supplies. This loan will help him to make a good buy at a price that is lower than usual.
He aspires to grow as a businessman and to have good earnings so that he can make the payments on this loan and also cover his personal expenses.

loan.use: to buy resin (a barrel), iron, cylindrical tubes, drafting squares and screws

loan.name: Yonis

texts.es: Yonis, reside en San Rafael Oriente, departamento de San Miguel, es agricultor, siembra maz y frijol, vive con su esposa y un hijo de 4 aos, l tiene 8 aos de dedicarse a esta labor, aprendi de sus padres y lo realiza todos los das de 6:00am a 3:00pm, dependiendo de la temporada. El est solicitando un prstamo para la compra de abono, fertilizantes y tratamiento para el suelo, con esto espera realizar una buena siembra de maz y frijol, este prstamo ser una gran ayuda para cubrir el gasto y preparase para la temporada. Su objetivo es trabajar por mucho tiempo, ya que de su trabajo depende su familia, por lo que su aspiracin es el desarrollo econmico de su familia.
texts.en:
Yonis lives in San Rafael Oriente in the department of San Miguel. He is a farmer who cultivates corn and beans. He lives with his wife and his 4 year-old son. He has been doing this work for 8 years. He learned how to farm from his parents, and he works every day from 6 am until 3pm, depending on the season.
He is requesting a loan to buy organic and chemical fertilizers and treatments for his soil; with these supplies he hopes to have a good harvest of corn and beans. This loan will be a great help to him, allowing him to cover his expenses and prepare for the upcoming season.
His goal is to work for a long time, since his family depends on his work. His goal is to create economic progress for his family.

loan.use: to buy organic and chemical fertilizers, and other soil treatments

location.town: San Rafael de Oriente, San Miguel

loan.name: Hawa

texts.en:
This is 42-year-old Hawa T.. She is married and has five children aged 19, 17,11, 9 and 2 years.
In the year 2009, Hawa established her provision, imported food and drinks business. She began her business with the hope of generating enough income to help her husband support their family. Working seven days a week and 11 hours a day, she earns about 400,000 SLL every month.
Hawa needs a loan in order to buy additional provisions, imported food and drinks for her business. She hopes that this loan will enable her to increase her monthly profits by approximately SLL 100,000.
In the future, Hawa plans to get a house for her family. She thanks you for your support.

loan.use: To buy drinks, imported food and provisions such as milk, sugar and margarine.

loan.name: Mario

texts.es: Don Mario, reside en San Rafael Oriente departamento de San Miguel, se dedica al cultivo agrcola desde hace 30 aos, el trabajo lo aprendi de su padre, trabaja todos los das de 6:00am a 3:00pm, l vive con su familia, tiene tres hijos de 11, 15 y 19 aos de edad, ellos dependen econmicamente. Actualmente don Mario iniciara los procesos sobre el cultivo de maz y frijol, para lo que solicita un prstamo y poder comprar abono, fertilizantes y tratamiento de plagas, esta inversin le ayudara a contar con todo lo necesario y echar andar el cultivo de este ao. Su objetivo es continuar cosechando la tierra, trabajando fuerte por sacar adelante a su familia.
texts.en:
Mario lives in San Rafael Oriente in the department of San Miguel. He has been farming for 30 years, a trade that he learned from his parents. He works every day from 6am until 3pm. He lives with his family, and has 3 children aged 11, 15 and 19 years, who are financially dependent upon him. Now, Mario is ready to start planting corn and beans, and so he is requesting a loan to purchase manure, fertilizer and pesticide. This investment will help him to have everything he needs to put his crops in this year.
His goal is to continue harvesting the land, working hard to provide for his family.

loan.use: to buy manure, fertilizer and pesticide

location.town: San Rafael de Oriente, San Miguel

loan.name: Sandra Milena

texts.es: Sandra Milena C. S. de 33 aos vive en el barrio Santuario de la ciudad de Barranquilla, ella es casada y madre de 3 hijos en las edades de 1 a 6 aos; Sandra Milena tiene su propio negocio donde comercializa productos de aseo personal y domstico, como talcos, desodorantes, cremas dentales, desinfectantes, papel higinico, medicamentos de venta libre y artculos de la canasta familiar, mediante el sistema de crdito y tambin de contado; este negocio se deriva de la actividad que su esposo desempe como impulsador de estos productos en una empresa y cuando dej de trabajar en ella, utiliz su liquidacin en el montaje de un negoci independiente y ya conocido por l, enseando tambin a Sandra a realizarlo para que lo apoyara y generaran ingresos juntos. Este es su primer financiamiento con la Fundacin Mario Santo Domingo y con el comprar jabones, desodorantes, talcos, cremas dental. Su sueo es ms adelante tener un vehculo propio que le facilite la distribucin de mercancas para la conservacin de los productos que comercializa y lograr aumentar su capital de trabajo para fortalecer su negocio y con ello poder brindar a sus hijos una educacin de calidad que canalice su xito. Mientras tanto Sandra contina trabajando con su esposo manejando una rentabilidad no menor del 22% la cual tiene como meta incrementarla, aplicando los crditos a su negocio y consiguiendo mejores oportunidades de compras que beneficien a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Sandra Milena C. S., 33, lives in the Santuario neighborhood in the city of Barranquilla. She's married and the mother of 3 children between the ages of 1 and 6. She has her own business selling personal hygiene and home products like powders, deodorants, tooth paste, disinfectants, toilet paper, over-the-counter drugs, and groceries. She takes cash and credit.
The business grew out of her husband's job. He promoted similar products for a company, and when he stopped working there, he used his severance pay to start his own independent business, since he already knew the field. He taught Sandra, too, so she could help out and they could make money together.
This will be Sandra's first loan with Fundacin Mario Santo Domingo. She'll buy soaps, deodorants, powders, ant tooth paste. Her dream is to later on have her own car to make it easier to store and distribute merchandise, and to grow working capital to strengthen the business. That way she can give her children a quality education so they can be successful.
In the meantime, Sandra keeps on working with her husband, bringing in a profit of no less than 22%, which it's her goal to increase. She's using her loans for her business and to gain better opportunities to buy products which will benefit her customers.

loan.use: to buy soaps, deodorants, powders, and tooth paste to sell.

loan.name: Abdul

texts.en:
This is 29-year-old Abdul K.. He is a widower and has one child, aged 9 years.
In the year 2009, Abdul established his used-clothing business. He began this business because he believed he ccould get enough income to support his family. Working seven days a week and 11 hours a day, he earns about SLL 400,000 every month.
He would like a loan in the amount of SLL 3,000,000. Abdul requires this loan in order to buy bails of used clothing. He hopes that this loan will enable him to increase his monthly profits by approximately SLL 200,000.
In the future, Abdul plans to buy a larger quantity of clothes to supply to other traders, to hire sales persons, and to open another stall. He thanks you for your support.

loan.use: To buy bails of used clothing for his business.

loan.name: Diana Alexandra

texts.es:
Diana de 35 aos, es una mujer trabajadora que tiene un taller de costura y confeccin. Tiene muchas aspiraciones con su negocio por eso quiere continuar con el haciendo costuras y confeccin.
Su taller lo tiene ubicado en una parte de su casa ya que aun no tiene capital suficiente para poder incursionar en un local. Ella hace ropa por pedido y las vende o espera que las retiren los dueos. Aunque su negocio lo comenz cuando tena poco capital ella ha vendi incrementando sus taller. Quiere continuar con su taller por eso quiere el prstamo para comprar telas y tener ms oportunidades de trabajar.
texts.en: Diana is 35 years old. She is a hardworking woman that has a sewing and tailoring workshop. She has high aspirations for her business. That is why she wants to continue sewing and tailoring. Her workshop is located in a part of her house since she doesn't have enough money to be able to set up in a different location. She makes clothes by request and sells them or hopes that the owners take it away. Although she started her business when she had little money, she has been increasing her amount of work. She wants to continue her business. That is why she asks for the loan to buy fabric and to have more working opportunities.

loan.use: to purchase fabrics.

loan.name: Flor Marina

texts.es: Flor, es comerciante D. frutas y verduras, resiD. en San Jorge departamento D. San Miguel, ella es casada, vive con su esposo y tres hijos D. 6, 8 y 11 aos D. edad, posee el negocio desD. hace 7 aos y fue fundado por iniciativa propia junto a su esposo, trabaja todos los das D. la semana D. 6:00am a 6:00pm, hasta la fecha no ha tenido dificultades con el negocio. Ella quiere invertir en la compra D. tomates, papas, uvas, bananos y otras ms, para esto solicita un prstamo que cubra con el gasto y le ayuD. a fortalecer el negocio, tratando D. tener para los clientes la mejor mercadera. Para ella su objetivo es tener una fuente D. ingreso estable, para cubrir los gastos D. sus hijos y velar por todas las necesidades del hogar.
texts.en:
Flor is a fruit and vegetable merchant. She resides in San Jorge in the Department of San Miguel. Flor is married and lives with her husband and three children (ages 6, 8, and 11). She has managed her business for seven years and started it through her own initiative and that of her husband. Flor works every day of the week from 6am to 6pm. As of this date, she has not had any difficulties with her business.

Flor wants to invest in the purchase of tomatoes, potatoes, grapes, bananas, and other types of produce. For this reason, she is requesting a loan to cover the expense and strengthen her business by attracting more customers with the best merchandise.

Her goal is to have a stable source of income to cover her childrens expenses and proviD. for all of the household needs.

loan.use: to purchase tomatoes, potatoes, grapes, bananas, and other types of produce.

loan.name: Marta

texts.es: Marta forma parte del banco comunal Creciendo con Fe perteneciente a la ciudad de Via del Mar. Ella se dedica a la produccin y venta de productos de repostera, adems tiene un bazar ubicado en su casa. Los productos de repostera los realiza en su casa y posteriormente los entrega a sus clientes, ya que la mayora son productos a pedido. Marta trabaja de lunes a sbado, vendiendo postres por las maanas y por las tardes se dedica a la produccin de repostera, tambin realiza chocolates de diferentes sabores. Adems de atender su bazar con artculos varios. Durante el mes de diciembre Marta participa de una feria, en la cual ofrece y vende sus productos. La mercadera para su bazar la compra en la ciudad de Santiago y los insumos para sus productos de amasandera los compra en distribuidoras y chocolateras. Con el prstamo comprar artculos para su bazar especficamente poleras, frazadas de polar, camisetas. Toda esta inversin para el da de la madre que es durante la quincena de mayo. Adems tiene proyectado comenzar con el negocio de la produccin y venta de huevos de chocolate para la pascua, que es durante el mes de abril. Sus metas son tener un local establecido para vender sus productos y sus sueos a nivel personal son brindarle una mejor calidad educacional a sus hijos y una vida ms confortable. Marta vive junto a sus hijos de 19 y 11 aos de edad, adems de su nieta de 2 aos y su madre. Ella es quien le ayuda en su negocio. Marta se siente a gusto con lo que hace, realizada y til con su negocio. Adems, est muy agradecida del crdito y apoyo brindado por Fondo Esperanza, respecto a las reuniones Marta participa activamente, ya que tambin es la tesorera de su grupo. Con los talleres ha aprendido contabilidad, conocimientos que ha ido aplicando a su negocio. Via del Mar es una ciudad y comuna ubicada en el litoral central de Chile, conocida como la Ciudad Jardn debido a los jardines y patios que poseen algunas viviendas antiguas de la ciudad. Tambin es considerada la capital turstica de Chile.
texts.en:
Marta belongs to the communal bank "Creciento con Fe," in the city of Via del Mar. She has a business making and selling pastries. She also has a store that is located in her house. She makes her pastry products in her house, and later she delivers them to her customers, since she makes most of her products to order. Marta works from Mondays to Saturdays, selling pastries in the mornings and making pastries in the afternoons. She also makes different varieties of chocolates, and attends to her store where she sells a variety of items. During the month of December Marta participates in a market where she sells her products. She buys the merchandise for her store from Santiago, and the supplies for her bakery from wholesalers and wholesale chocolate merchants.
With the loan she will buy items for her store, specifically: T-shirts, fleece blankets and shirts. All of this investment is for Mother's Day, which falls on the 15th of May. In addition, she has plans to start making and selling chocolate Easter eggs, as Easter comes in the month of April.
Marta's goal is to have a place to sell her products. At the personal level, she dreams of providing her children with a quality education and a more comfortable life.
Marta lives with her children, who are 19 and 11, her 2 year-old granddaughter and her mother, who helps her with the business.
Marta feels good about what she does, and her business gives her a sense of accomplishment and usefulness. She is also very grateful for the loan and the support provided by the Fondo Esperanza. Marta participates actively in the meetings there, since she is also the treasurer for her group. Through the workshops she has learned accounting, knowledge that she has also applied to her business.
Via del Mar is a city and community that is located on the central coast of Chile. It is known as the Garden City because of the gardens and patios that are found in some of the older homes in the city. In addition, it is considered to be the tourism capital of Chile.

loan.use: to buy T-shirts, fleece blankets and shirts

loan.name: Jose Geronimo

texts.es: Jos, reside en San Carlos departamento de Morazn, se dedica a la agricultura y ganadera, vive con su esposa y sus hijos, l est dedicado a la compra y venta de ganado, tambin cultivo de maz. l est solicitando un prstamo para la compra de una vaca y pagar el alquiler del terreno donde cultivara este ao, esta ayuda ser muy importante para Jos, ya que tanto como su familia dependen del trabajo que realiza. Su objetivo es tener una fuente de ingreso para dar a su familia y darle lo necesario.
texts.en:
Jos lives in San Carlos, in the department of Morazn, and his business is farming and ranching. He lives with his wife and children. He works buying and selling cattle, and he also grows corn.
He is requesting a loan to buy a cow and also to pay the rent for the land he will farm this year. This help will be very important for Jos, since both he and his family depend on the work he does.
His goal is to have a source of income to give himself and his family what they need.

loan.use: to buy a cow and pay the rent for the land where he will grow corn.

loan.name: Zoila De Jesus

texts.es: Zoila, resiD. en San Miguel, se dedica a la venta D. cosmticos y ropa, es casada y tiene un hijo D. 24 aos D. edad, ella desarrolla el negocio desD. hace 10 aos, dicha actividad la realiza D. 7:00am a 4:00pm, hasta la fecha no presenta problemas para realizar este negocio. Ella quiere invertir en mercadera comprando lociones, cosmticos y ropa, para ello solicita un prstamo que cubra esta compra, ayudando as a fortalecer el negocio y generar ms ingresos, estos le servirn para pagar los gastos familiares. Para Zoila mantenerse con el negocio y su principal objetivo, pues D. l depenD. su familia.
texts.en:
Zoila resides in San Miguel. She sells cosmetics and clothing. Zoila is married and has a son who is 24 years old. She has been developing her business for the past ten years. Zoila works from 7am to 4pm. As of this date, she has not experienced any problems with her business.

Zoila wants to invest in merchandise such as lotions, cosmetics, and clothing. For this reason, she is requesting a loan to cover the purchase and help strengthen her business. This will enable her to generate more income that she will use to pay the family expenses.

Maintaining her business is her primary objective since her family depends on it.

loan.use: to purchase cosmetics, lotions, and clothing.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to buy shoes to sell.

loan.name: Elmer Alirio

texts.es: Elmer, reside en San Francisco Gotera, departamento de Morazn, se dedica a la venta de llaves y alarmas para vehculo y venta de CDs. Vive con su esposa y su hija de un ao de edad. l tiene 3 aos de dedicarse al negocio, y actualmente necesita un prstamo para la compra de mercadera como alarmas y CD variados, esta inversin contribuir para el desarrollo con su negocio y ampliarse ms para los clientes. Su aspiracin es ser un gran comerciante, poseer lo mejor en artculos para vehculo y as mismo velar por las necesidades de su familia.
texts.en:
Elmer resides in San Francisco Gotera in the Department of Morazn. He sells keys, vehicle alarms, and CDs. Elmer lives with his wife and one-year-old daughter. He has worked in his business for three years and currently needs a loan to buy merchandise such as alarms and various CDs. This investment will contribute to the development of his business and expand it for his customers.

His aspiration is to be a successful merchant by providing the best vehicle merchandise so that he can provide for the needs of her family.

loan.use: to purchase vehicle alarms and various music discs.

loan.name: Maria Ofelia

texts.es: Mara, reside en San Miguel, tiene 35 aos de edad, se dedica a la venta de pupusas y tortillas, ella est viviendo con su esposo y un hijo de 11 aos de edad, su trabajo es elaborar tortillas, tiene una persona que le ayuda a prepararlas, trabaja de 10:00am a 2:00pm, tambin vende pupusas estas las prepara de 5:00pm a 8:00pm. Por el momento necesita comprar maz en cantidad abundante, pues debido al alto costo que tiene en el mercado, ella quiere comprar y almacenarlo en su vivienda, por esta situacin solicita un prstamo que cubra este gasto y que le ayude a tener en su casa una buena cantidad de maz. Su aspiracin es administrar dos negocios de pupusas, dar trabajo a ms mujeres, que como ella, se esfuerzan cada da por llevar el sustento diario a sus hogares.
texts.en:
Maria resides in San Miguel, is 35 years old, and sells 'pupusas' (a popular Salvadoran snack) and tortillas. She lives with her husband and a son, aged 11. Her work is to make tortillas. She has a person who helps her to prepare them. Maria labors from 10:00 am until 2:00 pm making tortillas, then from 5:00 until 8:00 pm, she sells 'pupusas'.
At present, she needs to buy corn in an abundant quantity. Due to the current high market price, she wants to buy corn and store it in her home. Due to the current situation, Maria is requesting a loan to cover the cost of purchasing a good quantity of corn for storage.
Her ambition is to administer 2 businesses selling 'pupusas', providing work for 2 women, who like her, struggle every day to provide daily sustenance in their homes.

loan.use: to buy corn for making tortillas and 'pupusas'.

loan.name: Glenda Yamileth

texts.es: Glenda, tiene 24 aos D. edad, resiD. en San Miguel, vive con sus dos hijos D. 3 y 5 aos D. edad, est casada y se dedica a la venta D. ropa, especficamente en la zona D. las playas, todos los das se dispone a vender D. 7:00am a 4:00pm. Actualmente est solicitando un prstamo para la compra D. ropa para la temporada D. verano, esta compra le ayudara a ofrecer a los clientes que visitan las playas, la ropa adecuada para baar, con la que espera tener mejores ingresos para su familia. El sueo D. ella es obtener un da su propia casa, D. su trabajo continuo espera ahorrar lo necesario y realizar su sueo.
texts.en:
Glenda, age 24, lives in the town of San Miguel; she is married and has two children aged three and five. Glenda makes her living selling clothing, especially in beach areas. She works everyday from 7am to 4pm.
Glenda is currently seeking a loan to purchase an inventory of clothing for the summer season which would allow her to offer her clients items necessary to go swimming and hopefully will help her to increase the income she earns for her family. Glenda's dream is to one day own her own house; she hopes that her continued efforts will enable her to save up the necessary funds to realize this dream.

loan.use: to purchase summer clothing

loan.name: Claudia Carolina

texts.es: Claudia, reside en El Transito departamento de San Miguel, vive con su hija de 3 aos de edad, se dedica a la venta de comida, este negocio surgi hace 10 aos, lo atiende todos los das de la semana preparando diferentes platillos para los clientes. Actualmente necesita un prstamo para la compra de verduras, carnes y condimentos, estos ingredientes le ayudaran a mantener una buena disponibilidad para preparar los mens diarios. Su aspiracin es trabajar por su hija, darle lo necesario e ir mejorando las instalaciones de la vivienda.
texts.en:
Claudia lives in the El Transito section of San Miguel. She lives with her 3-year old daughter and dedicates herself to selling food. She started her business 10 years ago, and tends to it every day of the week making different dishes for her customers.
Currently, she needs a loan to buy vegetables, meats and condiments. These ingredients will help her maintain her ability to prepare her daily menus. Her desire is to work for her daughter, providing what she needs and making improvements to their home.

loan.use: to buy vegetables, meats and condiments.

loan.name: Cristino

texts.es: Cristino, reside en Corinto departamento de Morazn, se dedica a la siembra de hortalizas, l vive con su esposa y su hija pequea de 4 aos de edad, l se dedica a los cultivos de hortalizas desde hace 20 aos, aprendi el proceso de las hortalizas por al proyecto ejecutado por CRV-MAG, en el cual daban asistencia tcnica a los agricultores sobre dicha produccin. El cultivara tomates en dos manzanas de terreno y para eso solicita un prstamo, para adquirir semillas, fertilizantes y abonos, estos insumos le ayudaran a mantener un buen cuido de la siembra y estar al pendiente de cualquier riesgo de plagas. Su objetivo es trabajar siempre en las hortalizas ya que es un trabajo que le agrada realizar y que su buena cosecha depende del cuido y dedicacin que se le brinde, espera que tambin su familia pueda progresar econmicamente a travs de su trabajo.
texts.en:
Cristino lives in the Corinto section of Morazn. He dedicates himself to planting crops, and lives with his wife and small 4-year old daughter. He has been in farming for 20 years, having learned the process through a project managed by CRV-MAG that gave technical agricultural assistance to farmers.
He will grow tomatoes on two blocks of land, which is why he is requesting a loan to buy seeds and fertilizers. These supplies will help him provide good care for the crops and watch for any risk of plague. His goal is to always work in farming as is this a job he enjoys doing, and because yielding good production from the crops requires care and dedication. He hopes also that his family will be able to progress financially through his work.

loan.use: buy seeds and fertilizers for his crops.

loan.name: Ana Gloria

texts.es: Ana, resiD. en San Carlos departamento D. Morazn, se dedica a la venta D. ropa D. forma ambulante, vive con su esposo y sus dos hijos Walter D. 18 aos y Glenda D. 16 aos D. edad, Ana venD. en San Francisco Gotera y otros municipios cercanos, tambin asiste a las redes solidarias. Ella solicita un prstamo para la compra D. ropa, blusas, manteles, ropa interior y otros, estas prendas le ayudaran a tener ms mercadera para ofrecer a los clientes y satisfacer sus gustos. Su aspiracin es tener un negocio estable, fijo, que sus hijos tengan lo necesario y puedan estudiar.
texts.en:
Ana lives in the San Carlos department of Morazn. She travels around selling clothing. She lives with her husband and her two children, Walter, 18 years old, and Glenda, 16 years old. Ana sells in San Francisco Gotera and other nearby cities. She also attends the Red Solidaria (Red Solidaria is an anti-poverty program in El Salvador). She is asking for a loan for the purchase of clothing, blouses, tablecloths, underwear, and other items. These items will help her to have more merchandise to offer her customers and satisfy their wants.
Her goal is to have a stable, fixed business, so that her children will have what they need and can study.

loan.use: to purchase clothing, blouses, tablecloths, underwear, and other items.

loan.name: Baax Yaye Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de Solidarit BAAX YAYE est cr le 27 aot 2009. Il est composer de 08 femmes issues du mme quartier. Leur activit principale est le petit commerce en gnral/ Le groupe fait partie du Banc Villageois de MONTAGNE NORD3.
Fatou M. (debout l'extrme droite de la photo avec de cheveux en friche) est responsable du groupe. Elle est ge de 28 ans. Elle est clibataire sans enfant.
Elle fait un petit commerce de vtements. Et paralllement elle fais de la coiffure. Elle pratique cette activit depuis environ 05 ans.
Son nouveau crdit lui permettra de s'approvisionner en marchandise ci-dessus numre et d'acheter aussi des produits pour la coiffure.
Objectif est de soutenir sa maman dans la prise en charge de la famille tout en subsistant ses besoins personnels
texts.en: The solidarity group Baax Yaye was created on August 27, 2009. It is made up of 8 women from the same neighborhood. Their primary business is, in general, small shops. The group is a member of the Montagne Nord 3 Banc Villageois. Fatou M. (standing at the far right of the photo with the wild hair) is the leader of the group. She is 28 years old. She is single with no children. She runs a small clothing shop. At the same time, she styles hair. She has run this business for 5 years. Her new loan will allow her to stock up on the merchandise enumerated above and to also buy hairstyling products. Her objective is support her mother in taking care of the family, while still supporting her personal needs.

loan.use: to purchase clothes intended for sale

loan.name: Yolenny Nebel

texts.es:
Yolenny de 46 aos, es una mujer trabajadora que empez su actividad hace 12 aos atrs, decidi entrar en la venta de comida y esto lo realiza en si domicilio. Est casada y tienen 5 hijos adultos.
Ella trabaja sola desde las 6H00 am hasta las 14H00 pm. Realizar desayunos y almuerzos. Su esposo trabaja como albail. Con el prstamo desea invertir en pescados arroz mesas y sillas. En un futuro desea construir segundo piso en su casa y poner ms bonito su negocio.
texts.en:
Yolenny, age 46, is married and has five grown children. She is a hardworking woman that started her food preparation business twelve years ago; she runs the business from her home.
Yolenny works alone from 6am until 2pm preparing breakfast and lunch. Her husband is a construction worker. She plans to use this loan to purchase fish, rice, tables, and chairs. In the future, she hopes to add a second floor to her house and to better outfit her business.

loan.use: to purchase fish, rice, tables, and chairs

loan.name: Bgg Diam Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarit BGG DIAM est compos de 12 femmes toutes issues du mme quartier. Cette cohabitation favorise la bonne entente et la cohsion entre les membres. Le groupe fait partie du Banc Villageois de MONTAGNE NORD3
Madame AWA G. (debout tout fait droite de la photo, de blanc vtue) est responsable du groupe. Elle est ge de 47 ans. Elle est marie et mre de 05 enfants. Elle a aussi le charge de deux autres enfants qui lui sont confis par des proches.
Elle fait de l'embouche caprine. Elle va dans les marchs acheter des chvres qu'elle embouche pendant au moins 05 mois avant de las revendre dans les marchs hebdomadaires ou dans la ville. Et comme activit parallle elle fait la cuisson et vente de beignets dans son quartier
Son crdit lui permettra d'acheter au moins trois chvres
Son objectif est de soutenir mes enfants dans leurs tudes tout en augmentant mon niveau d'pargne
texts.en: The solidarity group BGG DIAM is made up of 12 women all from the same neighborhood. This cohabitation favors the good relationship and cohesion between the members. The group is a member of the Montage Nord3 Banc Villageois. Mrs. Awa G. (standing completely to the right of the photo, in white clothing) is the leader of the group. She is 47 years old. She is married and the mother of 5 children. She also cares for two children who were entrusted to her by loved ones. She raises goats. She goes to the markets to buy the goats which she raises for five months before reslling them in the weekly markets or in town. At the same time, she runs a business cooking and selling doughnuts in her neighborhood. Her loan will allow her to buy at least three goats. Her objective is to support her children in their studies, while augmenting her savings level.

loan.use: To purchase goats to raise

loan.name: Isabel

texts.es: Isabel se dedica al comercio desde hace varios aos, vende ropa, zapatos. Con el fin de apoyar a su familia y lograr la construccin de su casa, el cual la est haciendo toda de concreto, lo que es de gran satisfaccin poder lograr el objetivo. Esta construccin la ha logrado gracias a los financiamientos que Afodenic ha dado durante cinco ciclos, y que ha venido poco a poco construyendo, teniendo la mano de obra sin costo, ya que su esposo es de profesin maestro de obra. Con esta nueva solicitud, comprara materiales de construccin, para seguir levantando paredes para lograr la terminacin de su vivienda. Un techo digno y un techo mas seguro.
texts.en:
For several years, Isabel has been working in retail commerce -- she sells clothing and footwear in order to support her family and to finish building her house. It is very satisfying to Isabel to be able to achieve this goal and she's been able to advance this construction thanks to the financing from Afodenic that she has received over five loan cycles.
Little by little Isabel and her husband have been building the house; she does not need to pay for the labor since her husband is a construction foreman by profession. Isabel will use the new loan to purchase construction materials so that she could continue building the walls and finish her new house that would give her family a safe and decent home.

loan.use: to purchase the construction materials necessary to finish building her house

loan.name: Luz

texts.es: Luz forma parte del banco comunal Creciendo con Fe perteneciente a la ciudad de Via del Mar. Ella tiene un puesto donde vende confites, bebidas y helados. Este es un carro kiosco, que puede trasladar a diferentes lugares con su mercadera. Luz se dedica a ste rubro desde hace 10 aos. Su mercadera la compra en confiteras y distribuidoras, donde los precios sean ms convenientes para invertir. Con el prstamo comprar mercadera para abastecer su negocio, adems invertir en materiales para reparar su carro, especficamente lona y ruedas, ya que a ste se le debe realizar una mantencin. Sus metas son tener un local establecido, donde pueda ofrecer y vender sus productos, adems quiere comprar una camioneta para trasladar su mercadera. Pretende concretar ste proyecto durante ste ao. Y sus sueos a nivel personal, son surgir y brindarle a su familia una vida ms confortable. Sus motivaciones de continuar con el negocio, son para concretar sus proyectos y sueos. Luz vive junto a su esposo y sus 4 hijos ms su nuera. Ella est muy contenta y agradecida del crdito obtenido por Fondo Esperanza, ya que con ste podr invertir en su negocio y generar mejores ganancias. Adems participa de los talleres para dirigir mejor su negocio, en donde ha aprendido a registrar sus gastos y ganancias, adems de distribuirlos mejor. Respecto a las reuniones con su grupo, Luz se siente contenta, ya que existe solidaridad y comunicacin al interior de ste. Via del Mar es una ciudad y comuna ubicada en el litoral central de Chile, conocida como la Ciudad Jardn debido a los jardines y patios que poseen algunas viviendas antiguas de la ciudad. Tambin es considerada la capital turstica de Chile.
texts.en:
Luz is a member of the communal bank "Creciendo con Fe" which is located in the city of Via del Mar. She has a vending post where she sells ice-cream, drinks, and sweets. It is a mobile kiosk that can be moved from place to place along with the merchandise. Luz has been in this line of work for ten years.
Luz buys her inventories from pastry shops and distributor companies where she can purchase at lower prices. She will use the loan to buy the supplies for her business. Furthermore, she will use part of the loan to perform maintenance on her vehicle, especially the wheels and the tarp cover.
Luz's goal is to have her own established location where she could offer her products; she also wants to buy a pickup truck for transporting her merchandise. Luz would like to realize these projects this year. In terms of her personal dreams, Luz wants to bring a more comfortable life for her family; she lives together with her husband and her four children as well as her daughter-in-law.
Luz is very grateful and happy about the loan given by the Fondo Esperanza since it will allow her to invest in her business and improve her income. Also, Luz participates in the workshops on how to better administer your own business where she learned how to track her income and expenses and how to better distribute them. She feels happy about her group because she finds that its members have good communication and team spirit.
Via del Mar is a city located in the central coastal area of Chile; it is known as the Garden City because of the gardens and courtyards that adjoin some of the older buildings in the city. It is also considered the tourist capital of Chile.

loan.use: to purchase inventory for her business and to buy materials for vehicle maintenance

loan.name: Rosa Kelly

texts.es:
Rosa tiene 25 aos de edad, es casada y reside junto a su familia en el sector Mediana ubicado a 10km del distrito de Mrrope. Un distrito agrcola que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Lambayeque, a ms de una hora de la ciudad de Chiclayo
Se dedica a la crianza de animales menores los cuales alimenta y cuando alcanzan un buen nivel de desarrollo los ofrece a la venta a sus vecinos y personas que vienen a trabajar en la zona, esta actividad la realiza hace 7 aos, adicionalmente se dedica a la elaboracin y venta de chicha de jora. Ella prepara esta bebida en su domicilio y los ofrece en venta. El negocio es de mucha ayuda para su familia, ya que por medio de este se encarga de ayudar al sostenimiento de su economa diaria.
Rosa desea ampliar su negocio con la compra de ms animales lo que permitir obtener mayores ingresos, asi tambien desea adquirir insumos para elaborar esta bebida. Por ello ha credo conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crdito de 1000 nuevos soles con los cuales piensa lograr su objetivo.
texts.en: Rosa is 25, married and lives with her family in Mediana which is 10km from Mrrope, in an agribultural district of Lambayeque, over an hour away from the city of Chiclayo Rosa raises domestic animals for sale to neighbors and local residents. She has been engaged in this business for the last 7 years, and also sells chicha, making this drink at home and selling it to local clients. This small business allows her to meet everyday expenses for her family. Rosa wishes to grow her business and is seeking credit in the amount of 1,000.00 soles from Edpyme Alternativa to meet her objective.

loan.use: to buy domestic animals

loan.name: Sop Sergne Fallou Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarit SOP SERGNE FALLOU est ne le 27 aot 2009 au jour de l'inauguration du Banc Villageois de MONTAGNE NORD3 qui l'abrite. Il est compos de 14 femmes qui habitent toutes le mme quartier. Leurs activits sont diverses, elles font du maraichage, de l'embouche, du petit commerce etc.
Madame PENDA N. (debout derrire droite du groupe sur la photo) est responsable du groupe. Elle est ge de 36 ans. Elle est divorce avec un enfant en charge.
Elle fait du micro-jardin et de l'embouche ovine. Et comme activit parallle elle fiat un petit commerce de chaussures
Avec son nouveau crdit elle va acheter des intrants pour son micro-jardin, un mouton et des paires de chaussures pour revendre
Son objectif est d'assurer la prise en charge de la scolarit de son fils. Elle participe aussi la prise en charge de la nourriture de sa famille.
texts.en: The solidarity group Sop Sergne Falloe was born on August 27, 2009 on the day of the inauguration of the Montagne Nord3 Banc Villageois, which hosts it. It is made up of 14 women who all live in the same neighborhood. Their businesses are varied: they truck farm, raise animals run small shops, etc. Mrs. Penda N. (standing in the back to the right of the group in the photo) is the leader of the group. She is 36 years old. She is divorced with one child in her care. She grows a micro-garden and raises sheep. As a parallel business, she runs a small shoe shop. With her new loan she will buy the factors of production for her micro-garden, a sheep, and some pairs of shoes to re-sell. Her objective is to assure that she can care for her son's education. She is also responsible for providing the family's food.

loan.use: to purchase the factors of production (fertilizer, enrichment, products) to grow a micro-garden and some sheep to raise

loan.name: Carmen Rosa

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal VIRGEN NATIVIDAD; Este banco est ubicado en la provincia D. Urubamba y departamento D. Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Carmen Rosa: es casada y tiene 56 aos la socia tiene 6 hijos D. los cuales 3D. ellos son independientes y otros tres tiene 22, 20. 13 aos D. edad; la socia se dedica al comercio minorista, la socia compra y venD. maz seco al por mayor y menor, la socia tambin se dedica a la crianza D. animales menores tales como chancos, cuyes pollos, tambin tiene ganados, la socia venD. sus productos a un tercero que los lleva a Arequipa y Lima, la socia desea el prstamo para invertir en la compra D. semillas, abono y todo lo referente a la siembra D. maz para esta nueva etapa D. cosecha. La socia solicita el prstamo para comprar semillas y abonos para la tierra.
La socia est muy agradecida por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos D. dicho prstamo D. forma disciplinada.
texts.en: This borrower is a member of the communal bank VIRGEN NATIVIDAD; in Urubamba, Cusco. Carmen Rosa is 56, married and has 6 children; three live independently and the others are ages 22, 20 and 13. She is a vendor, and buys and sells dry corn on both the wholesale and retail markets. Carmen also raises animals such as pigs, guinea pigs and chickens, as well as cows. Carmen sells her products to others who market them in Arequipa and Lima; she seeks a loan to buy seed, fertilizer and other products to grow maize. Carmen is pleased to have the opportunity to access credit and is committed to prompt repayment.

loan.use: to buy seed and fertilizer for maize production

loan.name: Lucia Margarita

texts.es:
Lucia de 63 aos, es un mujer trabajadora que desde hace 40 aos lleva apoyndole a su esposo en la venta de pescado con el capital que gano por venta de pescado puso su negocio de implementos de pesca.
Ellos trabajan de lunes a domingo delas las 5H00am hasta las 7H00pm, su esposo tiene su propia embarcacin con el cual hace la pesca mientras ella est en la venta de implementos para la pesca. Con el prstamo va a comprar trasmallo, boyas, piolas artculos de pescas para mejorar su negocio e incrementar sus ganancias.
texts.en:
Lucia, age 63, is a hardworking woman that has been helping her husband in realizing fish sales for over 40 years. With the capital that they earned from fish sales, she started a business selling fishing supplies.
They work from Monday to Sunday, from 5am to 7pm. Her husband has his own boat in which he goes fishing while Lucia works selling fishing supplies. She will use the loan to purchase an inventory of items such as nets, bobbers, and fishing line which would allow her to improve her business and increase her earnings.

loan.use: to purchase nets, bobbers, and fishing line

loan.name: Carmen Araceli

texts.es:
Carmen de 58 aos, es Directora de la Unidad Educativa Ciudad de Playas desde hace 10 aos, es un puesto que lo heredo de su familia.
Actualmente sigue encargada de la escuela ya que ha estudiado para mantenerla. labora desde las 7H00 am a 15H00 pm hasta que no haya alumnos dentro de la institucin y tiene una gama de profesores asignados para diferentes reas. Con el prstamo ella va a comprar implemento de construccin. Ella espera poder seguir al mando de su escuela y adecuarla para darle un mejor servicio a la poblacin y ensear a ms alumnos.
texts.en: Carmen is 58 and has served as principal of the Ciudad de Playas School for 10 years, a position she gained through her family ties. She manages the school and has trained to maintain it, working from 7 a.m. to 3 p.m. with students and a crew of teachers assigned to different areas. Carmen seeks credit to buy construction materials, to expand the school and improve conditions to benefit local students and families.

loan.use: to buy construction materials

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to purchase beauty products

loan.name: Carlos Fernando

texts.es:
Carlos de 52 aos, es un hombre trabajador que inicio como taxista gracia a un dinero que tena ahorrado en el banco y as se compro un vehculo.
Trabaja diariamente desde la maana hasta la noche. Le dificulta la delincuencia ya que la ciudad cada vez esta peligrosa. El es viudo y tiene dos hijos mayores de edad. Con el prstamo desea comprarse otro vehculo y asi darle la entreda del auto para aumentar sus ganancias.
texts.en:
