Carlos, 52, is a hard working man who started taxi driving thanks to some money that he had saved in the bank, that is how he bought a vehicle. He works every day from morning until night. Crime is a difficulty, since the city is increasingly dangerous.
Carlos is a widower and has two adult children. With the loan he wants to buy another vehicle so that he can give them the car to increase profits.

loan.use: purchase a vehicle.

loan.name: William Alex

texts.es:
William tiene 23 aos de edad, es soltero y reside junto a sus padres en el casero Mi Carcape que es una zona rural del distrito de Monsefu, un distrito agrcola que se encuentra situado en la regin Lambayeque, a ms de media hora de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la regin Lambayeque.
El se dedica a la crianza y venta de ganado ovino, el cual cra en un ambiente dentro de su domicilio, cuando estos ya han alcanzado un buen nivel de desarrollo los ofrece en venta al pblico en general y a los negociantes que suelen visitar la zona. Esta actividad la realiza hace 5 aos y con los ingresos que percibe de esta actividad se encarga de sacar adelante a su familia.
William desea ampliar su negocio comprando ms animales de modo que pueda aumentar sus ventas, sobre todo para el mes de Julio que es cuando la demanda por sus animales aumenta, por ello ha credo conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crdito de 1000 nuevos soles.
texts.en:
William is 23 years old and unmarried. He lives with his parents in the small village of Mi Carcape, a rural area in the Monsefu district. This is an agricultural district located in the region of Lambayeque, more than half an hour from the city of Chiclayo, capital of the Lambayeque region.
He raises and sells sheep in a room inside his home. When they have reached a good level of development, he sells them to the general public and dealers who usually visit the area. He has been engaged in this business for 5 years and with the income he receives from this business, he is responsible for helping his family get ahead.
William wishes to expand his business buy buying more animals so he can increase sales, especially for the month of July as this is when demand for his animals increases. For this reason, he believes it is appropriate to request a loan from of 1000 nuevos solos from Edpyme Alternativa.

loan.use: purchase other animals in order to grow his business.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: maquina de coser y telas

loan.name: Ana De Jesus

texts.es: Ana, reside en El Transito departamento de San Miguel, se dedica a vender pupusas y refrescos, vive con su esposo y tiene dos hijos de 10 y 6 aos de edad, ella comenz el negocio por al apoyo de un familiar, realiza sus ventas todos los das por las tardes, actualmente solicita un prstamo de $300.00 para la compra de materiales para el negocio. Su inversin ser en lea, maz, bebidas y otros ingredientes, esto le ayudara a tener una mejor solvencia de materiales en su negocio y podr aumentar la produccin. Ella tiene como objetivo, ser una microempresaria de xito, mejorar la atencin a los clientes y estar en buenas condiciones con su familia.
texts.en:
Ana lives in El Transito, departmento of San Miguel, where she sells pupusas [a traditional stuffed flatbread made with cornmeal] and soft drinks. She lives with her husband and has two children of 10 and 16 years of age. She started her business with the help of a family member and sells her products every day in the afternoons.
Currently she is requesting a $300 loan to purchase supplies for the business. Her investment will be in firewood, corn, drinks and other ingredients. This will allow her to have a greater quantity of materials on hand to use in her business so she will be able to increase production.
Her goals are to be a successful micro-entrepreneur, to improve customer service and to be in good condition with her family.

loan.use: to purchase firewood, corn, drinks and other ingredients.

loan.name: Bokk Xalaat Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarit BOKK XALAAT est n le 07 avril 2011. Il cr au jour de l'inauguration du Banc Villageois de GUINAW RAIL RAO qui l'abrite. Il est compos de 26 femmes qui sont du mme village. Le groupe est galement compos d'agricultrices, d'leveuses et de commerantes. Les membres sont unis par des liens de parent, de voisinage et d'amiti.
Madame MAIMOUNA S. (debout tout fait droite de la photo) est responsable du groupe. Elle est ge de 26 ans. Elle est clibataire sans enfant.
Elle fait un petit commerce de cartes de recharge tlphonique. Elle s'approvisionne auprs des reprsentants des oprateurs tlphoniques pour revendre dans son village. En sus, elle fait la cuisson et vente de beignets dans le village.
Son tout premier prt avec CAURIE-MF lui permettra de mieux dvelopper ses activit en achetant plus de cartes de recharge et des provisions pour la prparation de ses beignets.
Son objectif est d'assurer le payement de la location de sa maman la capital (Dakar) tout en cherchant avoir une pargne consistante dans le Banc Villageois
texts.en: The solidarity group BOKK XALAAT was established on April 7, 2011 on the inauguration day of the Banc Villageois of GUINAW RAIL RAO, which hosts the group. The group is composed of 26 women who are from the same village. The group is also composed of crop farmers, livestock farmers, and shopkeepers. The group members are united by ties of kinship, community, and friendship. Ms. MAIMOUNA S. (standing at the far right of the photo) is the groups manager. She is 26 years old, unmarried, and without children. She has a small business involving rechargeable mobile phone cards. She gets her supplies from phone providerss in order to resell them in her village. On the side, she makes and sells beignets in the village. This loan, her very first one with CAURIE-MF, will enable her to develop her business further by buying more phone cards and some supplies for making beignets. Her goal is to make sure her mothers rent is paid in the capital (Dakar) while trying to build substantial savings in the Banc Villageois.

loan.use: to buy rechargeable phone cards for resale

loan.name: Nelly Naty

texts.es:
Nelly de 37 aos, es una mujer trabajadora que inicio su actividad vendiendo tiles escolares en su papelera escogi esa actividad ya que tena que mantener a sus hijos, es separada y tiene tres hijos de 16, 17, 18.
Ella labora desde la 7H00am hasta las 9H00pm con la ayuda de su hija. Con el prstamo desea comprar tiles escolares papelera y mochilas para incrementar su negocio y aumentar sus ingresos. Ella desea seguir en el negocio para darle lo mejor a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Nelly, age 37, is separated and has three children aged 16, 17, and 18. She is a hardworking woman who decided to start her own school supply business because she had to provide for her children.
Nelly works from 7am until 9pm with the help of her daughter. She will use the loan to purchase school supplies, stationary, and backpacks in order to expand her business and to increase her income. She wants to continue to develop her business to be able to provide the best for her children.

loan.use: to purchase backpacks, stationary, and school supplies

loan.name: Magaly

texts.es:
Magaly es una madre D. familia D. 38 aos D. edad que resiD. junto a su familia en el sector Quemazn del distrito D. Mrrope. Un distrito agrcola que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia D. Lambayeque, a ms D. una hora D. la ciudad D. Chiclayo
Magaly se dedica a la crianza y comercializacin D. animales esta actividad la realiza desD. hace 10 aos. Ella cra sus animales, especialmente aves, ovejas y vacas en un corral situado cerca a su domicilio, conoce a la perfeccin este rubro porque le enseo su padre. Ella los alimenta D. granos y pastos naturales, cuando ya han alcanzado un buen nivel D. desarrollo los ofrece en venta a los negociantes que frecuentemente visitan la zona en donD. resiD..
Magaly desea adquirir ms animales y alimento balanceado para ampliar su negocio y percibir mayores ingresos, por ello ha credo conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crdito D. 1500 nuevos soles que le ayuden a lograr su objetivo.
texts.en:
Magaly is a 38-year-old mother who lives with her family in the Quemazn sector of Mrrope district, an agricultural area located in the province of Lambayeque, more than an hour from the city of Chiclayo.
Magaly raises livestock for sale and has been in business for ten years. She cares for her animals, in particular poultry, sheep and cows, in a corral located near her home. She knows this line of business like the palm of her hand because her father taught it to her. She feeds the animals grains and natural grasses, and once they have achieved a good level of development she offers them for sale to the merchants who frequently visit the area where she lives.
Magaly wishes to acquire more animals and a balanced feed in order to grow her business and make better earnings. Thus she has thought it advisable to seek a loan of 1,500 nuevos soles from Edpyme Alternativa which will help her achieve her objective.

loan.use: to purchase livestock for her business.

loan.name: Faustina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal LAS TRIUNFADORAS; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Andahuaylillas, perteneciente a la provincia de Quispicanchis y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Faustina; ella tiene 39 aos de edad y es casada y tiene 5 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de artesana, ella vende chompas, maletines, collares y aretes, tambin la socia trabaja deshojando maz son trabajos eventuales que realiza, el trabajo de artesana ella vende en la plaza de armas de Andahuaylillas y por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de artesana. La socia solicita el prstamo para comprar artesana al por mayor.
La socia est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the "Las Triunfadoras" communal bank. The bank is located in the district of Andahuaylillas in the Quispicanchis province in the department of Cusco.
Faustina is 39 years old and married. She has 5 children. She alternates her daily activities with her business selling handcrafts. She sells sweaters, bags, necklaces, and earrings, and she also works husking corn from time to time. She sells the handcrafts in the central plaza in Andahuaylillas, and through this business she is moving her children forward. She wants to expand and improve the handcrafts business. She is asking for a loan to buy wholesale handcrafts.
She is happy because of the loan, and she is committed to paying back the installments on time.

loan.use: to purchase wholesale handcrafts.

loan.name: Jazmin Jessenia

texts.es:
Jazmn de 21 aos, es una joven emprendedora que inicio su negocio con una pequea grabadora y una inversin de $60 , ella quera tener su propio negocio que cogi esa actividad de vende CD de msica. Est casada su esposo trabaja vendiendo mercadera y tiene un hijo de 4 aitos que est en escuela.
Ella trabaja sola desde las 10H00 am hasta las 6H00 pm, su dificultad en el trabajo es que tiene que movilizarse y llevar cajas pesadas. Con el prstamo desea incrementar su mercadera para mejorar sus ingresos. En un futuro desea tener otro negocio y empezar en las ventas de ropa.
texts.en:
Jazmn, 21 years old, is an entrepreneurial young woman who started her business with a small recorder and an investment of $60. She wanted to have her own business, and she started selling music CDs. She is married; her husband works selling merchandise, and they have a 4-year-old child who is in school.
She works alone from 10am until 6pm. The difficult thing about her job is that she has to move around and carry heavy boxes. With the loan, she wants to increase her merchandise in order to improve her earnings. In the future, she wants to have another business and start selling clothing.

loan.use: to purchase CDs and movies.

loan.name: Francisca

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal LAS TRIUNFADORAS; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Andahuaylillas, perteneciente a la provincia de Quispicanchis y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Francisca; ella tiene 32 aos de edad y es conviviente y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de productos secos, ella vende trigo, cebada y maz en forma independiente y junto a su esposo tienen un negocio de venta de vasos y platos descartables, su esposo vende el negocio de venta de vasos y platos en forma ambulatoria y por medio de estos negocios los esposos sacan adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar sus negocios. La socia solicita el prstamo para comprar productos secos y vasos y platos descartables al por mayor.
La socia est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Seora Francisca is 32 years old and is a member of the communal bank Las Triunfadoras, located in the district of Andahuaylillas in the province of Quispicanchis and the department of Cusco. She is married and has 3 children. She alternates her daily activities between independently selling dried products like wheat, barley and corn and, together with her husband, they have a business selling disposable cups and plates. Her husband sells the disposable cups and plates as a street vendor and through these businesses they are able to provide for their children. Seora Francisca wants to expand her business. She is requesting a loan to buy dried products and disposable cups and plates wholesale. She is happy about the loan and is committed to making her payments on time.

loan.use: to purchase dried products and disposable cups and plates wholesale.

loan.name: Cruz Mercedes

texts.es:
Cruz de 55 aos, es una mujer trabajadora que comenz su negocio cuando se separado de su marido y se fue a vivir al bastin y desde entonces realiza las ventas de comida para sacar adelante a su familia que alquilo un local en la principal de donde vive.
En la actualidad trabaja desde las 5H00 pm hasta las 11H00 pm con la ayuda de unos de sus hijos. Le dificulta en su negocio la competencia ya que hay ms comedores de comida alrededor de ella. Con el prstamo quiere comprar un asadero para aumentar su productividad. En un futuro quiere tener un gran negocio pues hay negocio ms grande que el de ella.
texts.en:
Cruz, 55, is a hardworking woman who began her business after separating from her husband. She went to live in the Bastin neighborhood and from that time has worked selling food to support her family, renting a commercial site on the main road in the area where she lives.
Currently she works from 5 p.m. until 11 p.m. with the help of one of her children. Her business faces difficulties due to competition since there are other businesses serving food in her area. With the loan she hopes to purchase a griddle to increase her productivity.
In the future she wants to have a large business as there are those that are larger than hers.

loan.use: to purchase a griddle.

loan.name: Sergio Bosco

texts.es:
Sergio de 47 aos, es un hombre trabajador que laboro para un compaa donde lo liquidaron y de all se compro una camioneta y empez a realizar fletes aos despus vendi la camioneta para comprarse el auto con el actualmente trabaja.
Labora de lunes a domingo desde las 7h00 am a 8h00 pm. Es viudo u tiene una hija de 16 aos que todava estudia. Con el prstamo quiere arreglar su auto para as aumentar su productividad ya que algunas veces le est fallando. Una de sus metas es terminar su vivienda para darle lo mejor a su hija.
texts.en:
Sergio, age 47, is a hardworking gentleman who was employed for a company that went out of business. While working there, he purchased a truck for carrying freight. Years later, he sold the truck and purchased a car that he currently uses for work.

Sergio works Monday through Sunday from 7am to 8pm. He is a widower and has a 16-year-old daughter who is still in school. Sergio will use this loan to repair his automobile so that he can increase his productivity which has been lacking at times. One of his goals is to finish his home so that he can provide the best for his daughter.

loan.use: to pay for auto repairs.

loan.name: Irma

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal VIRGEN NATIVIDAD; Este banco est ubicado en la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Irma: es soltero y tiene 24 aos de edad; la socia se dedica a la compra y venta de choclo, la socia tiene terrenos de cultivo y ella siembra y cosecha choclos, una vez cosechado ella los vende; la socia tambin trabaja en un hotel en la zona, ella desea invertir su prstamo en la compra de semillas y abonos, la socia solicita el prstamo para comprar semillas y abonos para la tierra.
La socia est muy agradecida por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de dicho prstamo de forma disciplinada.
texts.en:
Irma, age 24, is a member of the communal bank VIRGEN NATIVIDAD; the bank is located in the Urubamba province of the Cusco department. Irma is single and makes her living buying and selling corn; she also has plots of land where she plants and harvests corn crops, which she then sells after the harvest. Irma also works at a local hotel.
Irma would like to use the loan to purchase seed and manure for her corn plots. She is very grateful for the loan and is committed to repaying it in a timely manner.

loan.use: to purchase seed and manure for cultivating corn

loan.name: Eudocia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal LAS TRIUNFADORAS; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Andahuaylillas, perteneciente a la provincia de Quispicanchis y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Eudocia; ella tiene 67 aos de edad y es viuda y tiene 1 hijo; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de chicha (bebida a base de maz) y maz, la socia tambin trabaja en la crianza de animales como cuyes, chanchos y gallinas y luego los vende en el mercado de la ciudad de Cusco y por medio de estos pequeos negocios la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere mejorar sus negocios de venta de chicha, maz y venta de animales. La socia solicita el prstamo para comprar alimentos para los animales y para comprar maz para hacer la chicha.
La socia est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Eudocia, age 67, is widowed and has one son. She is a member of the communal bank LAS TRIUNFADORAS; the bank is located in the district Andahuaylillas of the Quispicanchis province which is part of the Cusco department.
Eudocia divides her time between her daily activities and her business of selling chicha (a traditional drink made from corn). She also raises farm animals such as pigs and chickens, which she later sells in a market in the city of Cusco. By means of these small businesses, Eudocia has raised her son.
Eudocia would like to improve her business and is looking for a loan to purchase feed for the animals and to buy corn for the production of chicha. She is happy about the loan and is committed to repaying it in a timely manner.

loan.use: to purchase animal feed and to buy corn to make chicha (a traditiona corn-based drink)

loan.name: Maria Guadalupe

texts.es: Guadalupe tiene 38 aos de edad, ella esta casada con el seor Jos Juan el cual es empleado y tienen 2 nios de nombres Marina la cual estudia la secundaria y Juan estudiante de primaria. Doa Lupita como es conocida en su poblacin se dedica a vender ropa interior por catalogo y tambin vende colchas, ella tiene con este negocio hace 3 aos aproximadamente y dice que lo emprendi para ayudarle a su esposo con los gastos del hogar. Ella vende y ofrece su ropa interior y colchas en las casa y a sus conocidas y dice que las surte en la poblacin de Zitacuaro, ella las vende en pagos como para que se les haga a sus clientas mas fciles de comprar.
texts.en: Guadalupe is 38 years old and is married to Seor Jos Juan, who is employed. They have 2 children, Marina, who is in high school, and Juan, who is an elementary school student. Doa Lupita, as she is known in her area, sells undergarments by catalog as well as bedspreads. She has had this business for about 3 years and says that she started it to help her husband with the household expenses. She sells her undergarments and bedspreads from home in the town of Zitacuaro to people she knows. She sets up payment plans for her customers in order to make it easier for them to buy.

loan.use: to purchase women's undergarments for her business.

loan.name: Nora

texts.es: Nora forma parte del banco comunal Lontu I, perteneciente a la ciudad de Molina. Ella se dedica al corte y confeccin de ropa, desde hace 25 aos. Nora confecciona y vende a pedido sus costuras, sus clientes van a su casa para solicitar sus servicios. Ya sean faldas, pantalones, entre otros. La temporada de ms alta demanda es durante el mes de septiembre, ya que corresponde a la fiesta de la independencia de Chile. Su taller de costuras, est ubicado al interior de su casa, ah tiene 2 mquinas de coser industriales. Sus insumos los compra en las ciudades de Curic y Santiago. Con el prstamo comprar lanas y repuestos para reparar su maquina de coser. Sus sueos son brindarles a sus hijos una mejor calidad educacional y una vida ms confortable. Nora vive junto a sus 2 hijos de 24 y 21 aos de edad, ambos estudiantes universitarios. El mayor de ellos estudi Ingeniera civil y la hija menor estudia enfermera. Adems vive junto a su madre. Nora en la actualidad se encuentra realizando una casa de acogida para personas de la tercera edad. La construccin an no est terminada, ya que le faltan las instalaciones elctricas. Nora est muy contenta y agradecida del crdito y ayuda recibida por Fondo Esperanza, comenta que en las reuniones hay una buena convivencia y se han generado vnculos de amistad y solidaridad. Respecto a los talleres ha aprendido mucho, sobre todo a tratar con cordialidad a sus clientes. Molina es una comuna de la zona central de Chile, ubicada en la regin del Maule. Se caracteriza principalmente por ser uno de los grandes polos de la industria vitivincola chilena. Adems de las vides, est la industria frutcola, destacando la produccin de manzanas, peras y kiwis.
texts.en: Nora is part of the Lontu I communal bank, of the city of Molina. She has been dedicated to the making of clothes for 25 years. Nora creates and sells her clothing to order. Her clients go to her house to request her services. Currently she makes skirts and pants, among other things. The season of greatest demand is during the month of September, since this corresponds to the festival of the independence of Chile. Her tailoring workshop is located in the interior of her house. There she has 2 industrial sewing machines. She purchases her supplies in the cities of Curic and Santiago. With the loan she will buy wool and replacement parts to repair her sewing machine. Her dreams are to offer her children a better quality of education and a more comfortable life. Nora lives along with her 2 children, ages 24 and 21, both university students. The oldest of them studies civil Engineering and the younger daughter studies nursing. She also lives with her mother. Nora is currently building a home for senior citizens. The construction is not yet finished, since it lacks wiring. Nora is very happy and grateful for the loan and the aid received from Fondo Esperanza. She tells us that she has made good contacts in the meetings and has built bonds of friendship and solidarity. With respect to the workshops, she has learned a lot, above all to treat her clients with cordiality. Molina is a resident of the central zone of Chile, located in the Maule region, which is characterized chiefly by being one of the large centers of the Chilean winegrowing industry. Besides the vines, it is a center of the fruit-growing industry, emphasizing the production of apples, pears and kiwis.

loan.use: buy wool and replacement parts to repair her sewing machine

loan.name: Luz Vea

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal LAS TRIUNFADORAS; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Andahuaylillas, perteneciente a la provincia de Quispicanchis y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Luz Vea; ella tiene 20 aos de edad y es soltera; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de crianza de aves y tambin la socia trabaja en una piatera (es una tienda donde venden artculos para fiestas de cumpleaos), el negocio de crianza de aves los realiza con su papa, ellos cran patos y gallinas y luego lo venden en forma independiente, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de crianza de aves. La socia solicita el prstamo para comprar alimentos para las aves.
La socia est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The associate belongs to the LAS TRIUNFADORAS communal bank. The bank is located in the Andahuaylillas district, which belongs to the province of Quispicanchis and department of Cusco.
The assocate is Seora Luz Vea. She is 20 years of age and single. The associate alternates her daily activities with the business of raising birds and the associate also works in a piatera (a store where they sell articles for birthday parties). She runs the business of breeding birds with her father. They raise ducks and chickens and then they sell them independently. The associate wants to expand the bird breeding business. The associate requests the loan to buy food for the birds.
The associate is happy for the loan and she promises to comply with the payment schedule.

loan.use: to buy food for her birds.

loan.name: Timotea

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal LAS TRIUNFADORAS; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Andahuaylillas, perteneciente a la provincia de Quispicanchis y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Timotea; ella tiene 33 aos de edad y es conviviente y tiene 4 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de compra y venta de vacas, la socia cra las vacas las hace engordar y luego los lleva a lugares como Combata para poder venderlos, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de vacas. La socia solicita el prstamo para comprar alimentos para las vacas como pasto al por mayor.
La socia est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The associate belongs to the LAS TRIUNFADORAS communal bank. The bank is located in the Andahuaylillas district, which belongs to the province of Quispicanchis and department of Cusco.
The associate is Seora Timotea. She is 33 years of age, lives in a shared home and has 4 children. The associate alternates her daily activities with the business of buying and selling cattle. The associate raises the cattle, fattens them, and later takes them to places such as Combata to be able to sell them. By means of this business the associate helps her children get ahead. The associate wants to expand the cattle sale business. The associate requests the loan to buy food for the cows such as grass wholesale.
The associate is happy for the loan and she promises to comply with the payment schedule.

loan.use: to buy feed for her cattle such as grass wholesale.

loan.name: Luciola

texts.es:
Luciola tiene 62 aos de edad, es viuda y vive junto a sus hijos en el sector Jos Barsallo del distrito de Jos Leonardo Ortiz. Uno de los distritos ms poblados de la regin Lambayeque, caracterizado principalmente por tener altos ndices de pobreza, ya que las personas viven generalmente en zonas urbanas marginales que carecen de servicios bsicos.
Ella se dedica a la venta de fruta especialmente de pltano y granadilla. Desde hace 15 aos tiene instalado un pequeo puesto que est ubicado entre la Av. Venezuela y la Calle Uruguyay cerca al mercado del mismo distrito. Todos los das ofrece a sus clientes la fruta fresca los cuales adquiere en el mercado mayorista de Moshoqueque.
Luciola desea adquirir un lote de fruta (pltano y granadilla) adems de otras frutas que le permita ofrecer variedad e incrementar sus ingresos Por ello ha credo conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crdito de 200 nuevos soles.
texts.en:
Luciola is 62 years of age. She is a widow and lives with her children in the Jos Barsallo sector of the district of Jos Leonardo Ortiz, one of the most populated districts of the Lambayeque region, characterized principally by a high poverty index since the people live generally in marginal urban zones that lack basic services.
She is dedicated to the sale of fruit especially bananas and passion fruit. For the past 15 years she has had a small stall located along Venezuela Avenue and Uruguyay street close to the market of the same district. Every day she offers her clients the fresh fruit which she acquires in the wholesale market of Moshoqueque.
Luciola desires to acquire a lot of fruit (bananas and passion fruit) as well as other fruits that will allow her to offer variety and to increase her income. Because of this she has found it convenient to request a loan of 200 new soles from Edpyme Alternative.

loan.use: to buy a lot of fruit.

loan.name: Deggo Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarit DEGGO est n le 07 avril 2011. Au jour de l'inauguration du Banc Villageois de GUINAW RAIL RAO. Il est compos de 04 femmes qui sont toutes du mme village. Elles sont leur premire exprience par rapport au crdit au CAURIE-MF
Madame Fatou D. F. (debout droite sur la photo, emmitoufle avec une charpe blanche) est responsable du groupe. Elle est ge de 54 ans. Elle est marie et mre de 07 enfants dont les deux sont majeurs et marie.
Elle gre un atelier de couture. elle fait aussi de l'levage de petits ruminants et de l'aviculture
Son nouveau crdit lui permettra de dvelopper sa couture en achetant des tissus et des fournitures de coutures
Son objectif est de renforcer ses activits de coutures et d'levage et constituer une pargne assez consistante au niveau du Banc Villageois
texts.en:
The solidarity group DEGGO was established on April 7, 2011 on the inauguration day of the Banc Villageois of GUINAW RAIL RAO. The group is composed of four women, all from the same village. They are on their first experience with regards to borrowing from CAURIE-MF.
Ms. Fatou D. F. (standing at the right in the photo and snug in her white scarf) is the groups leader. She is 54 years old, married, and the mother of seven children, two of whom are adults and married. Ms. F. runs a sewing shop. She also raises small ruminants and poultry.
Her new loan will enable her to develop her clothing business by buying cloth and some sewing supplies and equipment. Her goal is to bolster her sewing and livestock businesses and to build up a fairly large savings account with the Banc Villageois.

loan.use: to buy cloth and sewing supplies and equipment

loan.name: Alejandrina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal LAS TRIUNFADORAS; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Andahuaylillas, perteneciente a la provincia de Quispicanchis y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Alejandrina; ella tiene 49 aos de edad y es soltera y tiene 7 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de compra y venta de maz, ella tiene un terreno de cultivo donde siembra maz y luego lo vende en forma independiente en lugares como Andahuaylillas y Juliaca, y por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere mejorar el negocio de venta de maz. La socia solicita el prstamo para comprar maz al por mayor.
La socia est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The associate belongs to the LAS TRIUNFADORAS communal bank. The bank is located in the Andahuaylillas district, which belongs to the province of Quispicanchis and department of Cusco.
The assocate is Seora Alejandrina. She is 49 years of age and single, with 7 children. The associate alternates her daily activities with the business of buying and selling corn. She has farmland where she sows corn and then sells it independently in places such as Andahuaylillas and Juliaca. Through this business the associate moves ahead with her children. The associate wants to improve her corn sale business. The associate requests the loan to buy corn wholesale.
The associate is happy for the loan and she promises to comply with the payment schedule.

loan.use: to buy corn wholesale.

loan.name: Rosmery Mirtha

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal VIRGEN NATIVIDAD; Este banco est ubicado en la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Rosmery: es soltera y tiene 25 aos de edad; la socia se dedica a la compra y venta de choclo, ayudando a su mam, la socia junto a su hermana y su mam, trabajan sus terrenos de cultivo de choclo y lo venden al por mayor, la socia ahora desea invertir su dinero en un nuevo negocio propio, ella desea alquilar una tienda comercial en Urubamba y vender ropa, la socia ya cuenta con un pequeo apoyo de capital que estuvo ahorrando por meses y le hace falta exactamente este monto que pide, La socia solicita el prstamo para invertir en su propio negocio de ropa.
La socia est muy agradecida por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de dicho prstamo de forma disciplinada.
texts.en:
Ms. Rosemary belongs to the community bank "Virgen Natividad" located in the province of Urubamba and Cusco.
Ms. Rosmery: is single and is 25 years old. She is engaged in the buying and selling of corn, helping her mother. Along with her mother and sister, they work their corn-growing territories and sell it wholesale. The borrower now wants to invest money in a new business. She wants to rent a commercial store and sell clothes in Urubamba. Ms Rosemary already has a small amount of capital that she was saving for months and needs exactly the requested loan amount. She is requesting a loan to invest in her own clothing business.
She is very grateful for the loan and agrees to meet the payments on the loan in a disciplined manner.

loan.use: buy and sell cloths.

loan.name: Manuela

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal LAS TRIUNFADORAS; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Andahuaylillas, perteneciente a la provincia de Quispicanchis y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Manuela; ella tiene 57 aos de edad y es casada y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de maz, la socia tiene un terreno donde siembra maz y luego lo vende en forma ambulatoria en el distrito de Andahuaylillas, la socia por medio de este negocio saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere mejorar y ampliar el negocio de venta de maz. La socia solicita el prstamo para invertir en la cosecha del maz como pagar el transporte y a las personas que ayudan a vender el maz.
La socia est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Sra. Manuela is a member of the Communal Bank Las Triunfadoras (The Winners) which is in the District of Andahuaylillas, Quispicanchis Province, Department of Cusco.

She is 57 years old, married, and has three children. Manuel divides her time between her daily activities and her business of selling corn. She has land for growing the corn that she eventually sells as a street vendor in the District of Andahuaylillas. This business enables her to move her children forward. Manuela wants to improve and expand her business, so she is requesting a loan to invest in her corn crop as well as pay for the transport of her goods and the wages of the employees who help her with selling the corn.

She is happy with this loan and promises to complete her payments.

loan.use: to invest in growing corn and pay her transportation costs and the wages of her employees.

loan.name: Jessica Mara

texts.es:
La Seorita. Jessica M. es socia del banco comunal Espoir Mi Bankito, vive por el sector de la Feria Libre en la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad es hermosa por su centro histrico, sus iglesias, su naturaleza y varios lugares tursticos en donde cuentan con una variada gastronoma y sus 4 ros la baan hacen de esta ciudad un hermoso lugar para visitar.
Jessica tiene 23 aos, es madre soltera de 2 hijos de 7 y 5 aos de edad quienes estudian en una escuelita de la comunidad. Vive en la casa de sus padres con quienes comparte los gastos del hogar.
Nuestra socia es comerciante y labora hace 5 aos en la venta de mariscos, trabaja de domingo a domingo desde las 6 de la maana hasta las 6 de la tarde.
Es el primer crdito que realiza en el banco comunal y lo va a invertir en la compra de mariscos como: pescado, camarn, langostinos, conchas, etc. para su negocio.
Su meta es culminar sus estudios de secundaria.
texts.en:
Srta. Jessica M. is a member of the Communal Bank ESPOIR Mi Bankito. She lives in the sector of Feria Libre in the city of Cuenca. This beautiful city is known for its historical center, its churches, its views of nature, various tourist spots, different cuisines, and the four rivers that surround this place.

Jessica is 23 years old and a single mother with two children (ages 7 and 5) who attend school in the community. She lives at home with her parents and shares in the household expenses. Jessica has worked as a merchant for five years and sells seafood. She works Sunday to Sunday from 6am to 6pm.

This is the first loan she has received from the Communal Bank. She will invest the money in the purchase of fish, shrimp, prawns, scallops, and other types of seafood for her business. Her goal is to finish her high school education.

loan.use: to purchase fish, shrimp, prawns, scallops, and other types of seafood.

loan.name: Valentina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal LAS TRIUNFADORAS; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Andahuaylillas, perteneciente a la provincia de Quispicanchis y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Valentina; ella tiene 35 aos de edad y es conviviente y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de crianza de gallinas y tambin se dedica a vender pasto y huevo sancochado en forma ambulatoria en el mercado de Andahuaylillas, su esposo trabaja como albail arreglando y pintando casas, por medio de estos pequeos negocios y trabajos la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar sus negocios. La socia solicita el prstamo para comprar una maquina de mezclar para el trabajo de su esposo como albail.
La socia est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Sra. Valentina is a member of the Communal Bank Las Triunfadoras (The Winners) which is in the District of Andahuaylillas, Quispicanchis Province, Department of Cusco.

She is 35 years old, in a common law marriage, and has three children. Valentina divides her time between her daily activities and her businesses of selling chickens, grasses, and boiled eggs as a traveling merchant at the market in Andahuaylillas. Her husband is a mason who repairs and paints houses. Through her small businesses and various jobs, Valentina is able to help her children get ahead. She wants to expand her businesses. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy a cement mixer for her husbands masonry work.

Valentina is happy with this loan and promises to complete her payments.

loan.use: to purchase a cement mixer for her husband's masonry work.

loan.name: Esmeralda

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal LAS TRIUNFADORAS; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Andahuaylillas, perteneciente a la provincia de Quispicanchis y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Esmeralda; ella tiene 25 aos de edad y es soltera y tiene 1 hijo; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de realizar servicio de llamadas, ella trabaja en forma ambulatoria en el paradero de los carros que salen a la ciudad de Cusco del lugar de Andahuaylillas, la socia trabaja desde las 7:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m, la socia quiere tener un negocio de venta de caldos de la carne de cordero. La socia solicita el prstamo para comprar carne, fideos y arroz para hacer los caldos.
La socia est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Sra. Esmeralda is a member of the Communal Bank Las Triunfadoras (The Winners) which is in the District of Andahuaylillas, Quispicanchis Province, Department of Cusco.

She is 25 years old, single, and has one child. Esmeralda divides her time between her daily activities and her business of providing calling services. She works as a street merchant at a bus station where vehicles from the city of Cusco arrive in Andahuaylillas. Esmeralda works from 7am to 6pm. She wants to start a business selling lamb stew, so she is requesting a loan to buy meat, noodles, and rice for making the stews.

Esmeralda is happy with this loan and promises to complete her payments.

loan.use: to purchase meat, noodles, and rice for making stews.

loan.name: Jess

texts.es:
Jess es un padre de familia de 37 aos de edad que reside junto a su familia en el sector Tranca Fanupe del distrito de Mrrope. Un distrito agrcola que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Lambayeque, a ms de una hora de la ciudad de Chiclayo
Se dedica desde hace 10 aos a la crianza y comercializacin de animales menores y aves de corral, el cra patos, pavos, gallinas y cerdos en la parte posterior de su domicilio y cuando estos ya han alcanzado un buen nivel de desarrollo las ofrece en venta a los negociantes que suelen visitar la zona en donde reside, conoce a la perfeccin este rubro por eso cuenta con clientela fidelizada.
Jess desea adquirir alimento balanceado para sus aves y cerdos, adems de animales para incrementar su negocio, ya que la demanda esta aumentado. Por ello ha credo conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crdito de 2000 nuevos soles.
texts.en:
Jess is a 37-year-old father who lives with his family in the sector of Tranca Fanupe in the District of Mrrope. This farming district is located in Lambayeque Province, which is more than an hour away from the city of Chiclayo.

Jess has been raising and selling domesticated animals and poultry for ten years. He raises ducks, turkeys, chickens, and pigs and sells them from his home. When the animals have reached the proper level of development, he offers them for sale to merchants who frequently visit the area where he lives. Jess is known for being a perfectionist in his trade and has a loyal customer base.

He wants to acquire balanced feed for his poultry and pigs, as well as additional animals so that he can expand his business since demand has increased. For this reason, he is requesting a loan from Edpyme Alternativa in the amount of 2000 PEN.

loan.use: to purchase animals and balanced feed.

loan.name: Purificacin

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal VIRGEN NATIVIDAD; Este banco est ubicado en la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Purificacin: es casada, la socia tiene 54 aos de edad, ella tiene 7 hijos todos ellos independientes, la socia tiene como principal actividad la agricultura, ella se dedica a la siembra y cosecha de maz, la socia tiene terrenos de cultivo y tambin segn a las pocas del ao ella siembra pasto, maz, papa y un poco de verduras en las laderas de sus terreno, la socia en esta ocasin desea comprar semillas y todo lo referente a la nueva siembra de maz, la socia solicita el prstamo para invertir en la compra de semillas para su terreno de maz.
La socia est muy agradecida por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de dicho prstamo de forma disciplinada.
texts.en:
Sra. Purificacin is a member of the Communal Bank Virgen Natividad which is located in Urubamba Province, Department of Cusco.

She is 54 years old, married, and has seven children who are all independent. Purificacins main business activity is agriculture. She spends her time planting and growing corn. According to the time of year, she grows grasses, corn, potatoes, and a few vegetables on the slopes of her land. On this particular occasion, Purificacin wants to buy seeds and other supplies for planting her new crop of corn. The funds from this loan will be invested in the purchase of seeds for her plot of corn.

Purificacin is very appreciative of this loan and promises to complete her payments in a disciplined manner.

loan.use: to purchase seeds and supplies for planting corn.

loan.name: Josefina Antonieta

texts.es:
La Seora. Josefina B. es socia del banco comunal Espoir Mi Bankito, vive por el sector Cristo del Consuelo en la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad es hermosa por su centro histrico, sus iglesias, su naturaleza y varios lugares tursticos en donde cuentan con variada gastronoma y sus 4 ros la baan hacen de esta ciudad un lugar hermoso para visitar.
La Seora Josefina tiene 34 aos, es casada y tiene 4 hijos de 12, 11, 9 y 7 aos de edad, todos sus hijos estudian en una escuelita de la ciudad. Su esposo es comerciante de mariscos, no tienen casa propia por lo que viven arrendando.
Doa Josefina se dedica a la venta de todo tipo de mariscos, esta actividad la desempea hace 8 aos, labora de domingo a domingo desde las 6 de la maana hasta las 6 de la tarde.
Es el primer crdito que realiza en el banco comunal y lo va a invertir en la compra de mariscos como: pescado, camarn, conchas, cangrejos, etc. para incrementar su negocio.
Su meta es tener casa propia.
texts.en:
Josefina B. is a member of the Espoir Mi Bankito communal bank. She lives in the Cristo el Consuelo area of the city of Cuenca. This city is beautiful because of its historic center, its churches, its natural features, and its various tourist sites, which feature a varied gastronomy. Its four rivers make the city a beautiful place to visit.
Josefina is 34 years old. She is married and has 4 children, 7, 9, 11, and 12 years old. All of her children study in a small school in the city. Her husband sells fish. They do not own their own house, so they rent.
Josefina sells all kinds of fish. She has been doing this for 8 years, and she works Sunday to Sunday from 6 in the morning until 6 in the evening.
This is her first loan with the communal bank, and she is going to invest it in the purchase of fish such as: shrimp, shellfish, crab, etc. in order to expand her business.
Her goal is to have her own house.

loan.use: to purchase fish, shrimp, shellfish, crab, etc.

loan.name: Roxana

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal LAS TRIUNFADORAS; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Andahuaylillas, perteneciente a la provincia de Quispicanchis y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Roxana; ella tiene 33 aos de edad y es conviviente y tiene 1 hijo; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de maz y tambin vende artesana, ella hace trabajos de artesana como muecas y lo vende en lugares como Arequipa, ella tambin tiene un terreno de cultivo donde siembra maz y lo vende en forma independiente, la socia quiere ampliar sus negocios de artesana y venta de maz, para invertir en la cosecha de maz. La socia solicita el prstamo para pagar transporte y para pagar a las personas que trabajan en la cosecha.
La socia est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Here is a member of the communal bank named "The Triumphant". The bank is located in the district of Andahuaylillas, located in the province of Quispinachis and the department of Cusco.
Her name is Roxana. She is 33 years old, married common-law, and she is the mother of 1 child. She alternates her daily activities with her business selling corn and she also sells crafts. She makes crafts such as dolls and she sells them in locales including Arequipa. She also has a cultivation field where she plants corn and she sells the product independently. She wants to expand her craft and corn business, to invest in her corn harvest business. She requests a loan to pay for transportation expenses and to hire help for the harvest.
She is happy for the loan and she is committed to making her payments.

loan.use: to pay for transport expenses and to hire help for the harvest.

loan.name: Gladis

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal LAS TRIUNFADORAS; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Andahuaylillas, perteneciente a la provincia de Quispicanchis y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Gladis; ella tiene 38 aos de edad y es conviviente y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de jora que es un ingrediente que se usa para hacer chicha (bebida a base de maz) y tambin trabaja en un saln de belleza, por medio de estos negocios la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere mejorar el negocio de saln de belleza y venta de jora. La socia solicita el prstamo para comprar jora al por mayor.
La socia est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Gladis, age 38, lives with her partner and has three children. She is a member of the communal bank LAS TRIUNFADORAS'; the bank is located in the district of Andahuaylillas of the Quispicanchis province which is part of the Cusco department.
Gladis divides her time between her daily activities with the business of selling jora, which is a corn-based product used for a preparation of chicha (a traditional corn-based drink). She also works in a beauty salon. By means of these activities, Gladis is able to provide for her children. She would like to improve both her beauty salon business and her jora sales.
Gladis is seeking a loan in order to be able to purchase jora at wholesale prices. She is happy about the loan and is committed to repaying it in a timely manner.

loan.use: to purchase jora wholesale (jora is a corn-based product used in preparation of a traditional drink)

loan.name: Rosa Melania

texts.es:
La Seora. Rosa E. es socia del banco comunal Espoir Mi Bankito, vive por el sector de los Totems en la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad es hermosa por su centro histrico, sus iglesias, su naturaleza y varios lugares tursticos que cuentan con una variada gastronoma y sus 4 ros que la baan hacen de esta ciudad un lugar hermoso para visitar.
Doa Rosa tiene 48 aos, es divorciada y tiene 3 hijos de 30, 21 y 16 aos de edad, su primera hija es soltera, trabaja y ayuda en la economa del hogar, su segunda hija estudia en la universidad y su ultima hija un colegio de la ciudad. No tienen casa propia por lo que vive arrendando.
La Seora. Rosa labora en el bar de un colegio, esta actividad la desempea hace un ao y trabaja a doble jornada en la maana y en la noche. Tambin realiza comida para todo acto social hace 18 aos, toda la gastronoma que realiza lo aprendido por habilidad.
Es el primer crdito que realiza en el banco comunal y lo va a invertir en la compra de materiales de construccin para construir su casa.
Su meta es terminar su casa.
texts.en:
Rosa E. is a member of the communal bank named "Espoir My Communal Bank". She lives in the sector of los Totems in the city of Cuenca. This city is beautiful for its historical importance, the churches, its natural habitats, and its various tourist areas equipped with a variety of restaurants and 4 rivers that run through it. All of these things make this a beautiful place to visit.
Rosa is 48 years old, divorced, and she has 3 children, aged 30, 21, and 16. Her eldest daughter is single, she works, and she contirbutes to the household economy. Her second daughter is in university and her youngest daughter attends school in the city. They don't have a house of their own so they rent.
Rosa works at the cafeteria of a school. She has had this business for the past year and she works a double shift, in the morning and in the evening. She has also prepared foods to cater all types of social occasions for the past 18 years. All of the recipes that she makes she learned through practice.
This is the first loan that she requests through the communal bank and she will invest it in the purchase of construction materials to build a house.
Her goal is to finish building her house.

loan.use: to purchase construction materials

loan.name: Alicia

texts.es: Alicia J. B. es una mujer muy emprendedora que se dedica al comercio de mercanca en general, aprovechando cada poca, oportunidad y cliente potencial al que consigue convertirlo en su comprador conociendo sus intereses, necesidades, gustos y posibilidades. Alicia es diseadora de calzado y aunque no ejerce esta actividad, es muy creativa y sabe identificar muy bien la mercanca que al cliente le gustara tener, eso s adaptado a la moda, a sus expectativas y posibilidades; as ella ha diseado un sistema de venta a crdito para cada uno atendindolo de acuerdo con su perfil. Alicia emprendi su negocio hace dos aos e inici entre amigos y gradualmente se ha ido extendindose entre sus vecinos y referidos a otros sectores. Este es su segundo financiamiento con la Fundacin Mario Santo Domingo con el anterior compr telas para producir vestidos de bao femenino, de esta forma diversific un poco su negocio e imprimi su creatividad y diseo al servicio de sus clientes. En la actualidad est aplicando a su credikiva con el cual comprar mercanca como ropa perfumes, accesorios femeninos electrodomsticos menores pues se acerca el da de la madre y sus clientes quieren sorprender a las madres de su familia y amigas con detalles para celebrar este maravilloso da. ,
texts.en:
Alicia J. B. is an enterprising woman who sells general merchandise. She takes advantage of each season, opportunity, and customer potential to get people to be her customers. She gets customers by knowing their interests, needs, likes, and possibilities.
Alicia is a shoe designer. Even though she does not exercise this business activity, she is very creative. She knows very well which merchandise her customers would like to have. She knows what fits with the style, customer expectations, and possibilities. She has designed a system of credit sales for each of her customers. She does this in accordance with their profile.
Alicia started her business two years ago. She started with friends, and she has gradually been expanding to her neighbors and referrals in other areas.
This is her second loan with the Fundacin Mario Santo Domingo. She used the previous loan to buy fabric to make womens bathing suits. This way she diversified her business a little, and she put her creativity and design at her customers service.
She is currently applying for a Kiva loan to buy merchandise like clothes, perfume, womens accessories, and small household appliances. Mothers Day is coming up, and her customers want to surprise their mothers and friends with items to celebrate this marvelous day.

loan.use: to buy merchandise like clothes, perfume, womens accessories, and small household appliances

loan.name: Saf Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarit SAF est cr le 27 aot 2009. Il est compos de 07 femmes qui sont toutes issues du mme quartier. Leurs activit sont diverses: la vente de tissus, la vente de produits cosmtiques, la vente de parfums etc. Le groupe fait partie du Banc Villageois de MAMADOU LAMINE G.
Madame FATOU F. N. debout droite sur la photo est responsable du groupe. Elle est ge de 42 ans. Elle est marie et mre de 02 enfants. Elle est aussi responsable de sa jeune fille.
Elle fait un petit commerce de tissus
Avec son premier crdit avec CAURIE-MF elle va mieux dvelopper son petit commerce de tissus afin d'accroitre ses bnfices
Son objectif est de subvenir aux besoins de sa famille et soutenir son mari pour la prise en charge de la scolarit et la sant des enfants. Elle compte galement renforcer ses pargnes dans le Banc Villageois
texts.en:
The solidarity group SAF was created on August 27, 2009. The group is composed of seven women who are all from the same neighborhood. Their businesses are diverse: selling cloth, selling cosmetics, selling perfume, etc. The group is part of the Banc Villageois of MAMADOU LAMINE G..
Ms. FATOU F. N. (standing at the right in the photo) is the groups leader. She is 24 years old, married, and the mother of two children. She also has a young girl in her care. Her business involves commerce in cloth. With her first loan from CAURIE-MF, she is going to develop her business further, so as to grow her profits.
Her goal is to support her family and her husband in covering the costs of schooling and health care for the children. She also plans on bolstering her savings account at the Banc Villageois.

loan.use: to buy cloth for resale

loan.name: Hipolita

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal LAS TRIUNFADORAS; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Andahuaylillas, perteneciente a la provincia de Quispicanchis y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Hipolita; ella tiene 35 aos de edad y es conviviente y tiene 4 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de helados, ella vende en forma ambulatoria desde las 9:00 a.m hasta las 3:00 p.m, ella vende en el distrito de Andahuaylillas en la puerta del estadio, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de helados. La socia solicita el prstamo para comprar insumos para comprar los helados.
La socia est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the Las Triunfadoras (Triumphal Women) Communal Bank. The bank is located in the district of Andahuaylillas in Quispicanchis province, department of Cusco.

Sra. Hipolita, age 35, is married and has 4 children. She alternates her daily activities with her business selling ice cream. She sells itinerantly from 9:00 a.m. until 3:00 p.m. in the district of Andahuaylillas at the entrance to the stadium. By means of this business the member has been able to help her children progress.

Sra. Hipolita wants to enlarge her ice cream sales business. She is applying for the loan in order to have the resources to purchase ice cream. She is happy to have the loan and promises to make all the payments on time.

loan.use: to have the resources for purchasing ice cream.

loan.name: Agustina

texts.es: Agustina es socia del Banco Comunal Dulce Amanecer, ubicado en el distrito D. Puno y departamento D. Puno, tiene 64 aos D. edad, D. estado civil casada, tiene 2 hijos independientes. Agustina tiene grado D. instruccin primaria (incompleta). Ella se dedica a la venta D. artesanas, trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos, desD. hace cinco aos. Su prstamo inicial fue D. S/ 300.00 nuevo soles, dinero que utiliz en su negocio D. venta D. artesana. Agustina trabaja junto con su esposo. Con este prstamo D. S/ 3000.00 nuevo soles, comprar 10 cubos D. lana para la fabricacin D. las chompas, chalinas, gorros, ponchos y comprar otras mercaderas para su negocio. Tambin nos cuenta que trabaja en otra actividad, se dedica a a la venta D. carros junto con su esposo, actividad que desarrolla para apoyar a su esposo. Su sueo es ser compradora D. terrenos para luego venderlos. Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal son las reuniones, la puntualidad y la responsabilidad.
texts.en:
Agustina is a member of the communal bank "Sweet Dawn", located in the district of Puno and the department of Puno. She is 64 years old, married, and she has 2 grown children. Agustina has a primary school education (incomplete).
She sells crafts and she has been with the Manuela Ramos Movement (Kiva Field Partner) for the past 5 years. Her first loan was in the amount of S/.300 nuevos soles and she used it on her crafts business. She works together with her husband.
This loan is in the amount of S/.3000 nuevos soles and she will purchase 10 cubes of wool to make jackets, sweaters, hats, and wraps. She will also purchase other merchandise for her business.
She also has another business. She sells cars with her husband. She is involved in this business to support her husband. Her dream is to buy land for later resale.
What she enjoys about her communal bank is the meetings, the timeliness, and the responsibility.

loan.use: to purchase 10 cubes of wool to make jackets, sweaters, hats, and wraps.

loan.name: Lizeth

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal VIRGEN NATIVIDAD; Este banco est ubicado en la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Lizeth: es soltera, la socia tiene 26 aos de edad, ella se dedica a la compra y venta de choclo con sus mam, la socia tiene terrenos agrcolas con su mam, la socia ayuda a su mam a sembrar y cosechar junto a su hermana y ellas llevan a vender al mercado al por mayor y menor, ella desea el prstamo para poder invertir en la compra de semillas, abonos y ayudar a su mam.
La socia est muy agradecida por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de dicho prstamo de forma disciplinada.
texts.en:
Here is a member of the communal bank named "Virgen Natividad". It is located in the province of Urubamba and in the department of Cusco.
Her name is Lizeth. She is single, 26 years old, and she has a business in buying and selling her mother's corn. She has agricultural fields together with her mother. She helps her mother sow and she harvests together with her sister. They take the product to sell at the market in wholesale and retail. She requires a loan to invest in the purchase of seeds, fertilizers and to help her mother.
She is very thankful for her loan and she is committed to making her payments in a disciplined manner.

loan.use: to invest in the purchase of seeds and fertilizers, and to help her mother.

loan.name: Segundo Rafael

texts.es:
Segundo tiene 49 aos de edad, es casado y reside junto a su esposa y sus tres hijos en en el distrito de Picsi, ubicado a treinta minutos de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la Regin Lambayeque.
Se dedica a trabajar en labores asociadas a la agricultura desde hace ms de 10 aos, el trabaja para un Compaa Agrcola donde realiza esta actividad junto a otras personas, el se traslada de su casa a esta compaa en una bicicleta llevando sus herramientas, adicionalmente se dedica a la crianza de animales.
Segundo desea adquirir nuevas herramientas para su trabajo que le permita realizar mejor su trabajo y con rapidez, asi tambin herramientas para sus hijos que tambin se dedican a esta actividad. Por ello se ha visto en la necesidad de solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crdito de 1000 nuevos soles.
texts.en:
Segundo, age 49, is married and lives with his wife and three children in the district of Picsi, located 30 minutes from the city of Chiclayo, the capital of the Lambayeque region. For more than 10 years, he has worked as an agricultural laborer for a farming company, where he carries out his job along with other persons. He travels from his house to this job by bicycle carrying his tools. In addition, he is engaged in raising animals.

Segundo wants to acquire new tools for his work. This will allow him to carry out his work better and faster. He also wants tools for his children, who also are involved in this job. Thats why he has seen the need of applying to Epydme Alternativa for a loan of 1000 new soles.

loan.use: to purchase tools for his agricultural work.

loan.name: Vicentina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal LAS TRIUNFADORAS; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Andahuaylillas, perteneciente a la provincia de Quispicanchis y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Vicentina; ella tiene 36 aos de edad y es soltera; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de desayunos como quinua, maca y en las tardes vende picarones y arroz con leche, ella vende en forma ambulatoria desde las 6:00 a.m hasta las 10:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de desayunos, picarones y arroz con leche. La socia solicita el prstamo para comprar insumos para hacer los desayunos y picarones.
La socia est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Here is a member of the communal bank named "The Triumphant". It is located in the district of Andahuaylillas and it belongs to the province of Quispicanchis and to the department of Cusco.
Her name is Vicentina. She is 36 years old and she is single. She alternates her daily activities with her breakfast restaurant business, selling quinoa and maca root and in the afternoons she sells donuts and rice pudding. She sells itinirantly from 6am to 10pm. It is through this business that she is able to provide for her children. She wants to expand her business selling breakfast foods, donuts, and rice pudding. She requests a loan to purchase ingredients to prepare her breakfast foods and donuts.
She is happy for this loan and she is committed to making her payments.

loan.use: to purchase ingredients to prepare breakfast foods and donuts.

loan.name: Agustina Manuela

texts.es: Agustina es socia del Banco Comunal Flor de Canela, ubicado en el distrito de Puno y departamento de Puno, tiene 56 aos de edad. Est casada y tiene 7 hijos independientes. Actualmente vive con uno de sus nietos quien an est en edad escolar. Agustina tiene educacin primaria (incompleta). La seora se dedica a la venta de tejidos como: chompas, suter, hinaguas, medias y artefactos. Trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace ocho meses. Su prstamo inicial fue de S/ 300.00 nuevo soles, dinero que utiliz en su negocio de venta de ropa. Con este nuevo prstamo de S/ 1000.00 nuevo soles, invertir en la compra de 50 kilos de lana para la fabricacin de sus chompas y comprar algunos artefactos para luego venderlos en distintas ferias, trabaja sola ya que su esposo es maestro en construccin. Su sueo es tener su carro para ponerlo a trabajar en servicio urbano. Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal es la facilidad del prstamo, las charlas y lo que ganan sus ahorros.
texts.en:
Agustina is a member of the communal bank named "Cinnamon Flower", located in the district of Puno of the department of Puno. She is 56 years old, married, and she has 7 grown children. She lives with one of her grandchildren who is still school aged. Agustina has a primary school education (incomplete).
She sells knitted crafts such as jackets, sweaters, socks, tights, and accessories. She has been with the Manuela Ramos Movement (Kiva Field Partner) for 8 months. Her first loan was in the amount of S/.300 nuevos soles and she used it for her clothing business.
This new loan is in the amount of S/.1000 nuevos soles and she will invest in the purchase of 50 kg of wool to make jackets and to purchase a few accessories to resell at the different fairs. She works alone as her husband is a construction worker.
Her dream is to have a car to be able to work in public transportation.
What she enjoys about her communal bank is the easy loan process, the training, and the interest earned on savings.

loan.use: to purchase wool and accessories.

loan.name: Justina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal LAS TRIUNFADORAS; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Andahuaylillas, perteneciente a la provincia de Quispicanchis y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Justina; ella tiene 78 aos de edad y es viuda y tiene 5 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de lea, piedras, ella tiene un cantera que es un lugar donde venden piedras, tambin la socia se dedica a vender chicha, gallinas y cuyes, el negocio de venta de animales lo realiza en forma ambulatoria y por medio de estos pequeos negocios la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere mejorar en sus diferentes negocios. La socia solicita el prstamo para comprar alimento para los animales.
La socia est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member belongs to Las Triunfadoras communal bank which is located in the Andahuaylillas district of Quispicanchis province in Cusco department.
She is Justina, 78, widowed, and she has 5 children. Justina mixes her daily activities with her business of selling firewood and stones. She has a quarry where she sells the stones. Justina also sells chicha (Peruvian alcoholic drink), chickens, and guinea pigs. The animal sales are done as a street vendor and with these small businesses, she helps her children get ahead. She would like to improve her various businesses and she is requesting a loan to buy animal feed.
This member is happy for the financing and promises to make the payments in the established time period.

loan.use: to buy animal feed.

loan.name: Liliana Elizabeth

texts.es:
Liliana de 28 aos, es una mujer trabajadora que desde pequea le gustaba jugar a ser estilista. Y se decido a estudiar para ser maestra de belleza. Es soltera u tiene un hijo que est en escuela
En la actualidad trabaja en el da en un saln de belleza y por la noche abre su propio negocio de peluquera. Con el prstamo quieres comprar materiales para su saln de belleza para as trabajar en cuenta propia y darle lo mejor a su hijo.
texts.en:
Liliana is a hard-working 28-year-old who, as a child, enjoyed pretending she was a hair stylist. So she decided to get training to be a beauty professional. She is single and has a school-aged son.
During the day she works in a beauty salon and at night runs her own hair salon. She plans to use the loan to buy beauty shop supplies so she establish her own business and provide the best she can for her son.

loan.use: To buy furniture, haircolour and supplies for her business

loan.name: Luisa

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal LAS TRIUNFADORAS; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Andahuaylillas, perteneciente a la provincia de Quispicanchis y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Luisa; ella tiene 40 aos de edad y es conviviente y tiene 7 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de maz, ella tiene una tierras de cultivo donde siembra maz y luego lo vende en el distrito de Andahuaylillas en forma independiente, tambin se dedica a la crianza de animales como chanchos, cuyes y gallinas y lo vende en el mercado de Andahuaylillas, la socia quiere mejorar y ampliar sus negocios. La socia solicita el prstamo para comprar alimento para los animales.
La socia est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the communal bank "LAS TRIUNFADORAS", which is located in the district of Andahuaylillas, in the province of Quispicanchis, department of Cusco.
Mrs. Luisa is 40 years old and lives with her partner and seven children. She alternates her daily activity with her business of selling corn. She owns cropland where she grows the corn that she later sells on an independent basis in the district of Andahuaylillas. She also raises animals such as pigs, guinea pigs and hens which she sells in the Andahuaylillas market.
She wants to improve and expand her business and plans to use the loan to buy animal feed.
She is very grateful for the loan and committed to paying it back on time.

loan.use: To buy animal feed

loan.name: Laura Del Carmen

texts.es: Laura es una pequea comerciante, que inicio hace varios aos con la venta de cosmtico y bisutera, logrando aumentar sus productos en ventas con financiamiento que Afodenic ha dado con plazos a costos bajo de inters. Su esposo tambin vende cosmtico aunque siendo discapacitados apoya a su familia. Su vivienda es de condicin muy sencilla, que espera a futuro poder mejorar. Con este nuevo prstamo comprara productos Avon, para seguir en aumento de sus venta ya que tiene que cubrir todos sus gastos y compromiso de pago, comprara: perfume, estuche de pinturas, crema de cutis, crema de cuerpo, pinturas de ua, vanidad, productos para nias en cosmticos.
texts.en:
Laura is a small businesswoman who began selling cosmetics and costume jewelry several years ago. With loans through Afodenic, which were low interest, she was able to increase her line of products.
Her husband also works selling cosmetics to help support the family, although he is handicapped. Their home is very modest and they hope to improve it in the future.
With this new loan Laura will buy Avon products so she can increase sales to cover expenses and pay back the loan. She plans to buy perfume, make-up, face and body cream, nail polish and children's products.

loan.use: To buy Avon cosmetic products such as perfume, make-up, face and body creams and children's products

loan.name: Awa Yeko Yor Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarit AWA YEKO YOR est cr le 27 aot 2009. Il est compos de 11 femmes qui sont issues du mme quartier. Elles sont unies par des liens d'amiti et de voisinage. Leur activit principale est le petit commerce.
Madame MAREME F. debout ( droite de la photo, de jaune vtue) est responsable du groupe. Elle est ge de 42 ans. Elle est marie et mre de 08 enfants.
Elle fait devant sa maison un petit commerce de beignets et de cacahoutes.
Avec son crdit elle va acheter des arachides qu'elle transformera en cacahoutes. Elle achtera aussi de la farine et des ingrdients pour la prparation des beignets
Son objectif est de renforcer son son activit afin de raliser plus de bnfices et augmenter son niveau d'pargne dans le Banc Villageois.
texts.en:
The AWA YEKO YOR cooperative group was created on August 27, 2009. It is made up of 11 women from the same neighborhood who came together as friends and neighbors. Their primary activity is small-scale business.
Mrs. MAREME F. (standing in yellow at right in the photo) is the group leader. She is 42 years old and married with eight children. She runs a small business selling fried pastries and peanuts in front of her house. With her loan she will buy peanuts to process for sale. She will also buy flour and other ingredients for the preparation of beignets. Her goal is to strengthen her business in order to make a larger profit and increase her savings in the Banc Villageois.

loan.use: to buy peanuts and ingredients to make beignets

loan.name: Margarita Amparo

texts.es:
Margarita tiene 40 aos de edad, es casada y reside junto a su familia en el sector 9 de Octubre, una zona urbana marginal de la ciudad de Chiclayo, una zona bastante comercial que se encuentra ubicada al norte del Per.
Se dedica desde hace 10 aos a la venta de artculos de cuero y badana como correas de cuero, billeteras, accesorios para el cabello y otros similares en un pequeo establecimiento situado en su en el mercado Modelo de la Cuidad de Chiclayo. El negocio tiene mucha acogida en la zona ya que ella es una de las pocas personas que ofrecen estos productos a precios accesibles y de buena calidad. Los ingresos que percibe de esta actividad los utiliza para solventar sus gastos universitarios de su hijo y ayudar a su esposo en el sostenimiento de los gastos econmicos de su familia.
Margarita desea adquirir ms productos de cuero, con diseos nuevos y juveniles que le permita tener ms clientes y poder ampliar su negocio. Por ello ha solicitado por primera vez a Edpyme Alternativa un crdito de 1000 nuevos soles con los cuales piensa lograr su objetivo.
texts.en:
Margarita is 40 years old, married and lives with her family in the "9 de Octubre" sector, in a marginal urban area of the city of Chiclayo, a commercial area in northern Peru.
For ten years she has been selling leather articles such as belts, billfolds, men's accessories and other items in a small establishment in the Modelo Market in the city of Chiclayo. The business is very popular in the area since she is one of the few people who offer this type of product at reasonable prices for good quality. She uses the income from her work to pay for her son's college expenses and help her husband with the household expenses.
Margarita wants to buy more leather products with new and youthful designs so she can attract even more customers and expand her business. This is her first loan request through Edpyme Alternative and she has requested 1,000 PEN, which she plans to use to help meet her goal.

loan.use: To buy products to expand her business

loan.name: Cristo Del Consuelo (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal Cristo del Consuelo est formado por 8 mujeres muy alegres, carismticas y sobre todo emprendedoras que luchan a diario en sus diferentes trabajos para mejorar la economa de sus hogares. Viven en la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad es la tercera ciudad ms importante del pas, cuenta con una variada gastronoma, tiene varios lugares tursticos para visitar y su gente es muy amable y carismtica.
La Seora Zoila Fernndez vive por el sector de Cristo Rey en la ciudad de Cuenca, tiene 42 aos, es divorciada y tiene 4 hijos de 22, 20, 18 y 16 aos de edad, su primera hija trabaja y ayuda en la economa del hogar, su segunda hija es casada e independiente, su tercera hija estudia en un colegio de la ciudad y su ultimo hijo trabaja solo para sus gastos personales. No tiene casa propia por lo que vive arrendando.
Doa Zoila se dedica a la venta de chuzos (carne en palito), esta labor la realiza hace 17 aos de domingo a domingo desde las 4 de la tarde hasta las 11 de la noche.
Este es el onceavo crdito que realiza en el banco comunal y lo va a invertir en la compra de producto para la elaboracin de chuzos como: carne, pimientos, cebolla, papas, salchichas, etc.
Su sueo es tener casa propia.
texts.en:
The communal bank, Cristo del Consuelo, is comprised of eight cheerful, charismatic women who are entrepreneurs and struggle daily in their respective businesses to improve their household economies. They live in the city of Cuenca which is the third most important one in the country. It has a varied gastronomy, many tourist sites and kind, charismatic people.
Mrs. Zoila Fernndez lives in the Cristo Rey area of the city of Cuenca. She is 42 years old, divorced and has four children, ages 22, 20, 18 and 16. Her eldest daughter works and helps cover household expenses. Her second daughter is married and independent. Her third daughter is in school in the city and her youngest son works to cover his own expenses. They live in rental property.
For seventeen years, Doa Zoila has been selling "chuzos" (meat on a stick), from Sunday to Sunday, from 4:00 p.m. to 11:00 p.m.
This is her 11th loan through the communal bank and she plans to use it to buy ingredients for the chuzos: meat, peppers, onions, potatoes, sausages, etc.
Her dream is to have her own home one day.

loan.use: To buy meat, peppers, onions, potatoes, sausages, etc.

loan.name: Cruz Maria

texts.es:
Cruz de 57 aos, es una mujer trabajadora que un da con la ayuda de su esposo puso su negocio de papelera en su domicilio ya que por su sector no haba y as reuni dinero y compro materiales escolares para complementar en su papelera.
Ella atiende su negocio desde las 7H00 am a 8H00 pm vendiendo tiles escolares y de oficina a estudiante y a clientes de su sector en compaa de su esposo. Un de su dificultades en el trabajo fue que un da por quedarse hasta tarde le quisieron robar por tal motivo el bazar esta abierto hasta las 8h00pm. con el prstamo desea comprar tiles escolares, papelera en general para as mejorar sus ingresos. En un futuro ella quiere expandir su negocio de papelera y ayudar a su esposo con la tercena que tiene para constru de arriba de su casa hacerla de 2 piso.
texts.en:
Cruz, 57 years old, is a hardworking woman. One day, with the help of her husband, she opened a stationary store in her home since there wasn't one in her area. She got some money together and bought some school supplies to supplement the stationary.
She works from 7:00am until 8:00pm selling school and office supplies to students and customers from her area, with help from her husband. One of the most difficult parts of the job was that one day when she was open late, she was robbed; for that reason, the store is open until 8pm.
